1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: Rossouw and Itumeleng's shady dealings are interrupted by the arrival of a relentless Interpol agent. Blessing struggles with expressing his feelings for Zintle. A long lost member of Mama Rose's past returns home and Sarah receives an unexpected offer.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: Agent Liam Hartley is on a desperate hunt and gets support from the Van Reenens and from Sarah despite Rossouw's efforts to interfere. The unexpected return of somebody from Mama Rose's past sparks conflict at Dinaledi. Thanks to Bernie, Blessing becomes more optimistic about his feelings for Zintle.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: Liam is suspicious about Itumeleng's involvement in an seedy situation. Zintle goes for her driver's licence test. Modise senses that Mama Rose is tense about something.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: Liam is convinced there is a link between Itumeleng and the case he is investigating. Even though she's trying her best, Mama Rose cannot let go of the past and Marang plans a big surprise for Zintle.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: Liam hits a dead end with his investigation. Itumeleng and Rossouw decide to put their plan into action. An outrageous claim can ruin Itumeleng's chances of becoming chief. Zintle gets the biggest surprise of her life.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Sarah and Liam hatch a plan to infiltrate Itumelengs lair. Mogorosi banishes someone from the village, but the person doesn't go quietly. After a confession, Blessing receives news from Zintle. Rossouw gives Itumeleng important info.

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: Karel and Tristan are furious but powerless when they learn about Sarah and Liam's plan. The 'three sisters' (Bernie, Lindsay, Diksie are disappointed with Zintle for being careless. A legal challenge to the chieftaincy causes trouble for the community.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: Sarah stumbles into a dangerous situation. Modise and Mama Rose discover the details regarding the legal contest to the chieftaincy. Zintle speaks to Blessing about their situation.

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: Sarah's life is in danger. Liam comes face to face with the main suspect of his investigation. Mama Rose and Modise realize they'll have to tell Itumeleng what they know. Marang begins the search for a new Head Ranger.

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: Modise must decide whose side he is on regarding the chieftaincy. Marang and Lelo come to a decision about a Head Ranger for the Lodge. Rossouw and Itumeleng try to cover their tracks, while Lelo gets news about TIro and deals with old feelings.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: Modise is keeping information from Itumeleng, but the weight of this burden is growing heavier. Bernie, Lindsay and Diksie find out who the new Head Ranger will be and have mixed feelings about the decision.

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: Itumeleng finds out just how deep betrayal runs. The campaign to strip Itumeleng of the chieftaincy is not showing signs of dissipating. Sarah tries to deal with an extremely difficult situation. Tristan and Lelo find a sense of closure regarding Tiro.

13.title: Episode #2.13
13.plot: Itumeleng tries to assure the council that everything is still on track for his inauguration even though there are still some unanswered questions. Lebata asks Marang if he can use Dinaledi for a fund-raiser. Itumeleng gets some of the answers about his past. Angie is still not ready to take her relationship with Jack to the next level.

14.title: Episode #2.14
14.plot: Modise is forced to make a decision. Diksie catches Marang in a heated moment. A sexy guest returns to Dinaledi for one thing - Jack.

15.title: Episode #2.15
15.plot: Itumeleng comes up with a controversial proposal to neutralize the claims against his chieftaincy. Lelo organizes a community upliftment day to celebrate Tiro's life, but bristles when Lebata arrives and draws the spotlight from Tiro. Angie struggles with jealousy when Jack comes face to face with Giovanna.

16.title: Episode #2.16
16.plot: Itumeleng continues with his daring plan about the chieftaincy. Marang and Kennedy Lebata find themselves the subject of major speculation. Angie and Jack clash over the sexy Giovanna and Mama Rose confronts Masilo.

17.title: Episode #2.17
17.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

18.title: Episode #2.18
18.plot: Itumeleng and Modise stand united as the fight for the Tladi chieftaincy continues. The DNA results for a paternity test are revealed. Lebata makes his true intentions known towards Marang. Giovanna makes a play for Jack.

19.title: Episode #2.19
19.plot: Marang meets a mysterious guest and his beautiful partner and gives Lebata an answer to his business proposal. Jack and Angie are still at loggerheads concerning Giovanna. The "three sisters" agree that Angie should forget about Jack. Modise refuses to make peace with his uncle.

20.title: Episode #2.20
20.plot: Itumeleng grows isolated from his brother and jealous of Marang and Lebata. Angie has mixed feelings about Jack being faithful. Amita is concerned for Khaya's health, while Maxine wants to be taken seriously.

21.title: Episode #2.21
21.plot: Itumeleng is forced to admit his feelings for an old friend. Angie's wild goose chase ends up breaking an unsuspecting heart. Resentful of Amita and Khaya's relationship, Maxine can't resist spoiling her husband with something sweet.

22.title: Episode #2.22
22.plot: Lindsay comes to terms with her feelings towards Tristan. Maxine has something up her sleeve and an infuriated Itumeleng lashes out.

23.title: Episode #2.23
23.plot: Marang admits to Diksie who the person is that owns her heart. Mama Rose nips Flora's expectations in the bud and Angie is shocked after a confrontation with Giovanna.

24.title: Episode #2.24
24.plot: Itumeleng and Marang's relationship takes an unexpected turn. The cause of Khaya's illness is revealed. Tension mounts between Tristan, Jack and Sarah while Lelo accuses Modise of trying to take advantage of her.

25.title: Episode #2.25
25.plot: Itumeleng and Marang decide to define their relationship. Tristan struggles to play the good father and Khaya's health continues to fail. Lelo and Modise come to a crossroad, much to Flora's envy.

26.title: Episode #2.26
26.plot: Modise is left indecisive when evidence about Lebata's corruption come to light. Maxine's frustration towards Khaya is growing and Lelo offers Marang a surprising truce. Karel goes to an old friend regarding a life-long secret of the land.

27.title: Episode #2.27
27.plot: Modise helps Lebata against better judgment. Lelo and Sarah fail to save Amber's ruined weekend and Karel is concerned about his meeting with Khaya. Itumeleng and Marang battle to find a balance while Maxine's son upsets her.

28.title: Episode #2.28
28.plot: Amita's suspicions grow about Khaya, while Itumeleng and Marang enjoy a blissful day out. Modise confronts Lebata about new corruption charges and Tristan is confronted by the consequences of his actions.

29.title: Episode #2.29
29.plot: Itumeleng wows Marang with a special trip. Amita tells Khaya about her suspicions. Modise rejects Flora's idea that he should run for office and Tristan admits that he's not the perfect father.

30.title: Episode #2.30
30.plot: Khaya makes a shocking discovery about his health. Tristan tries to make amends with the people around him and Karel continues to press Modise into pursuing a political career.

31.title: Episode #2.31
31.plot: Khaya's blood runs cold and Marang gives astute advice to Itumeleng. Modise kicks off his new career, only to hit his first setback. Tristan's attempt to get fit goes off track.

32.title: Episode #2.32
32.plot: An encounter with Lelo causes Itumeleng to question his past while Modise tries to get him to endorse his new career. Jack draws Angie into a bet with Tristan. Khaya has a confrontation with the culprit of a plot against him.

33.title: Episode #2.33
33.plot: Jack plays Angie off against Tristan in a bold and risky bet. Maxine makes a power move, much to Amita's dismay. Modise continues his bid for community support for his campaign. Itumeleng recognizes a ghost from his past in the newspaper.

34.title: Episode #2.34
34.plot: Marang's good mood is noticed by the Dinaledi staff. Modise gains a valuable supporter when he takes charge like a true leader. Everyone's excited and rooting for Angie, but the pressure may be too much for her and Jack.

35.title: Episode #2.35
35.plot: Itumeleng hides his worries about the ghost from his past. Lebata vows to destroy Modise while Marang vetoes Angie's ranger initiation, claiming that it's too dangerous. Tristan is a victim of over-training and Bernie battles to get a grip on her anger about Itumeleng and Marang's relationship.

36.title: Episode #2.36
36.plot: It's the day of the ranger initiation race between Tristan and Angie. What will the consequences be after Modise throws Lebata out of the community lapa? Mama Rose finds out that Itumeleng and Marang are having a romantic relationship.

37.title: Episode #2.37
37.plot: Tristan is found unconscious in the bush. Itumeleng and Marang deal with Mogorosi's meddling in their relationship. Modise is pleased to have Itumeleng as an ally for his political ambitions.

38.title: Episode #2.38
38.plot: Marang and Itumeleng part on bad terms when she can't join him for a romantic getaway. Mama Rose is concerned, because Lelo did not have a traditional cleansing. Maxine arrives at the lodge with much speculation from the staff. Jack is not happy with the growing friendship between Angie and Tristan.

39.title: Episode #2.39
39.plot: Maxine makes her presence felt at the lodge. Lelo starts experiencing mysterious physical problems. Tristan and Angie's friendship continues to grow, much to Jack's disapproval.

40.title: Episode #2.40
40.plot: Maxine turns on the charm to an unsuspecting Tristan as she digs for useful information. An overreaction makes Ashwin suspicious of Maxine. Tristan offers to help Rossouw mend his relationship with Angie. Modise worries about Lelo's worsening health.

41.title: Episode #2.41
41.plot: Itumeleng and Karel learn that an unwelcome "blast from the past" is closer to home than they thought. Modise's opposition plays dirty and Tristan convinces Angie to talk to Rossouw. Maxine familiarizes herself with her new surroundings and Lelo doesn't get the support that she hoped for.

42.title: Episode #2.42
42.plot: Amita arrives at Dinaledi and Maxine's plans are coming together. Lelo's health continues to fail while she's under increasing pressure to follow the customs of her people. Angie attempts to connect with Rossouw.

43.title: Episode #2.43
43.plot: Maxine and Itumeleng meet face to face. Rossouw and Angie break new ground in their relationship. Mama Rose and Modise confront Lelo about her cleansing ritual.

44.title: Episode #2.44
44.plot: Lelo goes back to mourning for Tiro. Ashwin and Amita meet while Maxine pays Lelo a visit - much to Itumeleng's horror. Will Angie and Rossouw connect?

45.title: Episode #2.45
45.plot: Itumeleng's dealings cause a rift between him and Marang while Maxine continues to get into Marang's good books. Sarah finds out about Rossouw's infidelity and Mama Rose's words finally hit home with Lelo.

46.title: Episode #2.46
46.plot: Maxine and Amita remain at loggerheads concerning work and one of the hosts at Dinaledi and Lelo makes a decision regarding her cleansing. Ashwin manipulates his way to get more info on Maxine and Angie sees a new side to Sarah.

47.title: Episode #2.47
47.plot: Lelo finally surrenders and undergoes the cleansing ritual. Karel attempts to uncover reasons for Maxine's ongoing stay at Dinaledi. Rossouw's relationship with Angie deepens and Aswhin gets closer to Amita.

48.title: Episode #2.48
48.plot: Sparks fly between Ashwin and Amita - and Marang comes down on him for flirting with the guests. The unveiling of Tiro's tombstone brings closure for Lelo and Sarah realizes that she's still angry with her dead mother.

49.title: Episode #2.49
49.plot: Ashwin is torn between his feelings for Amita and the mission he has to complete for Itumeleng. Tristan and the van Reenen's make plans for Amber's visit but they get more than they bargained for. Lebata makes Norman a dubious offer, while Lelo makes Modise a generous offer.

50.title: Episode #2.50
50.plot: Marang witnesses a moment between Itumeleng and Maxine that upsets her and Tristan follows Karel's advice. Modise misunderstands a meeting between Norman and Lebata, and takes drastic action. Itumeleng confronts Maxine.

51.title: Episode #2.51
51.plot: Modise lays down a challenge for the election and the Van Reenens attempt to hide their caution around Kate's impending visit. Zintle confronts Maxine on behalf of Marang.

52.title: Episode #2.52
52.plot: Itumeleng challenges Karel about a long buried secret. Tensions in the Van Reenen house grow as Amber and Kate arrive with Tristan struggling to find common ground with his daughter. Modise spreads his political message to the people.

53.title: Episode #2.53
53.plot: Maxine's true motives are revealed and Itumeleng tries to convince Marang that she's the only woman for him. Modise is disappointed when the person he wanted on his campaign team turns him down. Kate and Tristan deal with their difficult daughter.

54.title: Episode #2.54
54.plot: The lodge and the community are in an uproar as gossip spreads. Mogorosi demands a public statement from Itumeleng and Modise makes a surprise appointment to his campaign team. Jack thinks he's dodged a bullet when he hears Kate isn't staying at the lodge.

55.title: Episode #2.55
55.plot: Maxine manages to get under Marang's skin and a meeting is held behind Itumeleng's back. Modise makes a move to help a desperate Cindy. Kate and Angie finally meet, and Amber commits a small crime.

56.title: Episode #2.56
56.plot: Itumeleng and Maxine broker an uneasy deal and Marang believes she has won this round against Maxine. Modise organizes a cottage for Cindy at Go-Tladi but Lelo is suspicious of Cindy's motives. Issues between Tristan and Kate continue to grow.

57.title: Episode #2.57
57.plot: Itumeleng needs Karel on board to deliver on his promise to Maxine. Modise tell Lelo to get off Cindy's case and Angie decides she's ready to take things to the next level with Jack. Tristan and Kate are horrified when they discover what Amber has done.

58.title: Episode #2.58
58.plot: Lelo becomes jealous as Modise grows closer to Cindy. Itumeleng tries hard to keep the pact he made with Maxine. Tristan and Kate stand together as Amber is forced to take responsibility for her actions. Jack and Angie's plans for a romantic getaway are threatened by the arrival of a VIP guest.

59.title: Episode #2.59
59.plot: Marang tries to talk to Lelo on behalf of Itumeleng and makes a surprise confession. Modise's choice of partner for the Business Development summit causes an upset while Kate and Tristan begin to relax in each other's company. Angie's plans with Jack get an unexpected boost.

60.title: Episode #2.60
60.plot: Lelo takes on her new responsibility as the custodian of the Lebone interests. Tristan hears that his dream project in is jeopardy just as he and Kate reconnect.

61.title: Episode #2.61
61.plot: Karel, Lelo and Itumeleng plot Maxine's downfall and Modise receives a blow to his campaign. Angie and Jack take their relationship to the next level and become the center of attention at the lodge. Cindy gets a call from the past, while Kate and Tristan plan for the future.

62.title: Episode #2.62
62.plot: Lelo sees a darker side to Cindy. Kate and Tristan's honeymoon phase is threatened when their responsibilities start interfering. Jack is tempted when a guest makes a big offer for an illegal hunt.

63.title: Episode #2.63
63.plot: Jack and Angie grow ever closer, while he wrestles with the potentially lucrative illegal offer. Kate and Tristan deal with old hurts from their past and the different directions their lives have taken. Meanwhile, Modise seizes the limelight at the Business Summit, with Cindy by his side.

64.title: Episode #2.64
64.plot: In celebrating the success of the business summit, Modise and Cindy explore their growing feelings for each other. Kate and Tristan make an important decision about their future. Marang has to face the cold, hard truth about Itumeleng after an off-hand comment from a guest.

65.title: Episode #2.65
65.plot: After a night of passion, Modise gets a big surprise in the morning. Kate and Tristan give Amber bad news while Stan and Sherri depart from Dinaledi, unaware that Marang is upset about Itumeleng's involvement in illegal hunting.

66.title: Episode #2.66
66.plot: It is voting day, and Modise is concerned about Cindy. Can Lelo save Marang and Itumeleng's relationship? The news about Kate and Tristan makes its way to the lodge.

67.title: Episode #2.67
67.plot: The ballots are counted and the result surprises everyone. Tristan is annoyed with Lelo's partnership style while Jack and Angie make an agreement they can't keep. Modise gets news about Cindy.

68.title: Episode #2.68
68.plot: Modise and Lelo rekindle their friendship, while Ashwin reconnects with an old flame. Itumeleng drops a bomb on Karel and Lelo and Cindy goes to the police station.

69.title: Episode #2.69
69.plot: An unexpected arrest sends shock waves through the community and jeopardizes Itumeleng's position as the new Chief. Lelo thinks carefully about the land exploration proposal. Ashwin and Amita's closeness cause speculation amongst the staff.

70.title: Episode #2.70
70.plot: Itumeleng takes matters into his own hands when incriminating evidence appears in the newspaper and Lelo asks a difficult question which shatters a friendship. Tristan makes a decision about Tau Tona's future while Amita and Ashwin set some ground rules for their relationship.

71.title: Episode #2.71
71.plot: Modise feels resented while Lelo is doubtful and refuses to go to an important charity ball. Ashwin reveals Itumeleng's plans to Amita, leaving her to make a difficult and important decision.

72.title: Episode #2.72
72.plot: Amita disappears and Modise is shunned by the community, with his new job in jeopardy. Lelo is forced to make a difficult decision and Lebata pays Captain Rossouw an interesting visit.

73.title: Episode #2.73
73.plot: Tristan spirals into a depression and Itumeleng discovers that he was betrayed. Modise struggles to find supporters in the wake of the charges against him. Maxine and Itumeleng fire the first shots in their war.

74.title: Episode #2.74
74.plot: Modise is hounded by the press and Bernie becomes the scapegoat for something she didn't do. Maxine tries to get into Marang's good books, while Lelo cheers up Tristan by renegotiating the Tau Tona contract.

75.title: Episode #2.75
75.plot: Lesley discovers a link to Cindy's past. Maxine and Amita check back into the lodge, causing a ripple of mixed reactions. Mama Rose learns something disturbing and takes matters into her own hands, while Sarah takes charge of Tristan's love life.

76.title: Episode #2.76
76.plot: Modise and Lesley find new evidence, while Lebata continues to plot his demise. Lelo is in two minds about getting back into the dating game, while Marang and Itumeleng don't see eye to eye.

77.title: Episode #2.77
77.plot: Modise's relationship with Lesley takes strain after his first court appearance. Mama Rose makes a generous donation and Maxine manipulates Bernie into a confrontation. Tristan and Lelo gear up for their first dates.

78.title: Episode #2.78
78.plot: Modise discovers that he has an anonymous benefactor. Lelo is unsure about her first date and Bernie pays an interesting visit to Itumeleng.

79.title: Episode #2.79
79.plot: Bernie is caught in the middle of Maxine's plot. Modise tries to deal with the impact that his trial is having on the family and Tristan doesn't join in Lelo's enthusiasm for the dating life.

80.title: Episode #2.80
80.plot: Modise has a disastrous day in court and Itumeleng's plan with Maxine backfires. Tristan and Lelo try to figure out if they can work together and be friends as well.

81.title: Episode #2.81
81.plot: Lesley tempts Modise with a solution to make his trial go away and Lelo feels conflicted when she's called to testify. Itumeleng makes progress in his battle against Maxine.

82.title: Episode #2.82
82.plot: Karel and Sarah play matchmaker for Tristan with a woman from a neighboring farm. Modise's case is jeopardized, prompting Lesley to use scare tactics against Cindy. Itumeleng is curious as to why Amita rejected his offer.

83.title: Episode #2.83
83.plot: The stress of the trial takes its toll on Mama Rose's health and Marang is forced to reconsider her future with Itumeleng. Sarah uses Jack to trick Tristan into going a date.

84.title: Episode #2.84
84.plot: Lelo decides to help Modise. Maxine is delighted when she discovers that her meeting with Itumeleng caused more trouble in his relationship and we find out how Tristan's blind date unfolded.

85.title: Episode #2.85
85.plot: Modise's relief is short lived, while Itumeleng and Maxine negotiate the terms of their partnership. Jack's jealousy grows when he finds out who Angie met for drinks, leading to Bernie and Ashwin having some fun at Jack's expense.

86.title: Episode #2.86
86.plot: Modise breaks his bail conditions. Jack feels insecure about Angie and gets a reality check. Ashwin and Amita have to navigate the awkward phase of their relationship.

87.title: Episode #2.87
87.plot: Bernie raises further doubt in Jack and Angie's relationship. Modsie makes a breakthrough and returns home.

88.title: Episode #2.88
88.plot: Modise's newly discovered evidence falls into the wrongs hands while Lebata celebrates the calling of a new by-election. Jack and Angie deal with their jealousy. Zintle and Amita bond when they learn about each other's similar past.

89.title: Episode #2.89
89.plot: The charges against Modise are dropped while Maxine and Itumeleng's bond grows stronger. Lelo admits that she may have feelings for Modise. Jack and Angie look for a private place to make up.

90.title: Episode #2.90
90.plot: Modise is committed to his new job whilst Itumeleng gets distracted from Marang. When Jack is assigned to a beautiful female guest Lilly, Angie suggests they hide their relationship to make more money for their holiday. Will the idea pay off?

91.title: Episode #2.91
91.plot: Maxine and Itumeleng face a crisis regarding their business plan. Marang is troubled by her relationship with Itumeleng and Modise takes charge of his life.

92.title: Episode #2.92
92.plot: Jack finds himself in a dangerous situation with Lilly. Mama Rose takes justice into her own hands and Maxine engineers the end of Itumeleng and Marang's relationship.

93.title: Episode #2.93
93.plot: Jack withdraws from Lilly's company which annoys Angie, while tension continues to rise between Itumeleng and Marang. Diksie and Zintle go for a wild night out on the town.

94.title: Episode #2.94
94.plot: Relationships are on edge at Dinaledi as gossip spreads about Jack and Lilly, and Itumeleng's surprise for Marang doesn't end well. Amita plays it cool as Zintle tries to win both her friendship and approval.

95.title: Episode #2.95
95.plot: Maxine discovers that Modise won't play along with the land exploration. The tension increases as Jack worries that Angie will discover the truth, while Zintle treads on dangerous grounds with Ashwin and Amita.

96.title: Episode #2.96
96.plot: Bernie puts her feelings aside and decides to support Marang. Lelo and Modise apply pressure on the land exploration issues and Amita reveals her controlling side when Maxine proposes a new scheme. Angie walks in on the unthinkable.

97.title: Episode #2.97
97.plot: Emotions run high when Angie and Jack have an explosive argument. Maxine invites Itumeleng in on a scheme she has created. Diksie receives disturbing news and Amita starts an interesting game of seduction.

98.title: Episode #2.98
98.plot: Itumeleng is clear about his feelings leading Maxine feeling confident that her plan is working. A major change in Jack and Angie's relationship makes Bernie, Lindsay and Diksie embark on a campaign of revenge. Tristan receives a tempting offer.

99.title: Episode #2.99
99.plot: Itumeleng's concern grows on the eve of his Inauguration. Marang does soul searching after the big surprise. Tristan finds relief when he opens up about Kate's affair and Zintle is invited to an exclusive event.

100.title: Episode #2.100
100.plot: Itumeleng drops a bombshell at his Inauguration and Marang is distracted when Zintle does not return home. Jack's jealousy grows after Angie spends the night at the Van Reenen house.

101.title: Episode #2.101
101.plot: Itumeleng makes a remarkable proposal at the Inauguration sending Maxine's emotions spiraling sky-high. Jack has a momentary meltdown.

102.title: Episode #2.102
102.plot: In the aftermath of the inauguration, Jack remains paranoid about Tristan and Angie's growing relationship and Zintle lies to Marang. Lindsay and Bernie are concerned about Amita's influence when Maxine orders her to hold down the fort.

103.title: Episode #2.103
103.plot: Maxine threatens to ruin lives as Zintle and Amita's friendship continues to blossom. Jack gets a little insight regarding his relationship with Angie.

104.title: Episode #2.104
104.plot: Marang is curious to discover why Maxine left the lodge, but did not checked out. Jack plots his revenge against Tristan and Blessing tries to remind Zintle about the true meaning of friendship.

105.title: Episode #2.105
105.plot: Tristan and Blessing argue about Eva's whereabouts and how to find her. Modise is not happy with Lelo's financial decision and Zintle tries to track down the person behind a tweet campaign.

106.title: Episode #2.106
106.plot: The hunt for Eva continues as Itumeleng cements his position as Kgosi. Bernie learns a surprising fact about Amita and Tristan's lies continue to frustrate Angie. What will Marang do about her living situation?

107.title: Episode #2.107
107.plot: Jack smells a rat when Angie and Tristan talk about their relationship. Zintle and Amita's friendship is tested to the limits and Itumeleng discovers a downside to being chief.

108.title: Episode #2.108
108.plot: Blessing and Tristan's search for Eva has fatal consequences and Maxine returns with a secret weapon. Modise organizes a community initiative with two rival soccer stars that sparks the flames of an old rivalry.

109.title: Episode #2.109
109.plot: Itumeleng makes a decision regarding Eva that puts Blessing in a difficult position. The football rivalry between Bernie and Ashwin disrupts the Lodge, and Angie is forced to be honest with Tristan. Itumeleng is shocked to see that Maxine did not return alone.

110.title: Episode #2.110
110.plot: As Blessing and Tristan race against time to save Eva, Angie shares information with Tristan which upsets Jack. The Lodge is buzzing with excitement when players from Orlando Pirates and Sundowns arrive. Will Maxine succeed in her plot to get revenge?

111.title: Episode #2.111
111.plot: The hunt continues and Jack tries to beat his cousin to the chase. Itumeleng and Marang try to figure out Nathi's origins while Tristan contemplates a life changing decision. Or ... The clock continues to tick as Jack and Tristan try to save Eva, their competitive nature working in everyone's favor, for once. Itumeleng and Marang try to figure out Nathi's origins while Tristan contemplates a life changing decision.

112.title: Episode #2.112
112.plot: Angie declares her love while Marang fears that Maxine may have finally won. Modise and Lebata come head to head at the soccer match. Will Tristan find Eva before Jack does?

113.title: Episode #2.113
113.plot: Jack finds himself in a situation where he must think fast in order to save Tristan's life. Itumeleng evaluates his feelings for Nathi. Bernie and Ashwin get tickets to an important soccer match and Zintle tries to rekindle her friendship with Amita. Will Tristan accept the offer from Kenya?

114.title: Episode #2.114
114.plot: Tristan and Angie make an important decision about Kenya and Zintle opens up to Amita about a personal tragedy. Itumeleng decides to do a DNA test.

115.title: Episode #2.115
115.plot: Maxine prepares Itumeleng and Nathi for the test, while Jack tells Angie the truth. Tristan and Lelo have a heart-to-heart and Lindsay is hurt when her big dream is taken away from her.

116.title: Episode #2.116
116.plot: Tristan and Angie take a leap of faith but something is holding them back. Amita gets jealous of Zintle and Maxine gets help from an unexpected sidekick.

117.title: Episode #2.117
117.plot: Angie struggles to make sense of her life and Amita's jealousy gets the better of her. Itumeleng's troubles get worse after a shocking discovery.

118.title: Episode #2.118
118.plot: Amita's secret leads to a fight with Zintle, and Angie dreads going back to work. Lelo and Blessing struggle without Tristan, while Marang feels she may have lost Itumeleng despite Bernie's support.

119.title: Episode #2.119
119.plot: Maxine uses Nathi to put a Wednesdayge between Marang and Itumeleng and the tension between Jack and Angie continues to rise. Lebata is caught between Zintle and Amita's attention, who will he choose?

120.title: Episode #2.120
120.plot: Marang is worried about the test results - will her love for Itumeleng survive the outcome? The Tension between Jack and Blessing reaches boiling point and Zintle turns on the charm for her dinner guest.

121.title: Episode #2.121
121.plot: Marang's suspicions about Maxine forces Itumeleng to arrange a meeting with Doctor Lotz, while Amita's jealousy for Zintle goes viral. Jack turns the tables on Angie, thanks to Ashwin.

122.title: Episode #2.122
122.plot: Itumeleng takes matters into his own hands with Maxine, and Marang has a change of heart towards Nathi. Jack feels his family is taking sides against him, and Zintle threatens to expose Amita.

123.title: Episode #2.123
123.plot: Mama Rose has her own plans to foil Maxine's threats. Nathi makes a shocking discovery that may have tragic consequences and Marang continues to question her future with Itumeleng. Who will Lelo choose to be the new Head of Conservation?

124.title: Episode #2.124
124.plot: Tragic news brings the lodge to a stand-still. Karel and Sarah come to an agreement and Maxine opens up to Mama Rose. Will Ashwin and Zintle forgive Amita?

125.title: Episode #2.125
125.plot: Maxine has a heart-to-heart with Nathi but tragedy strikes. Meanwhile Jack has a heated argument with Angie. Lelo makes a decision about the position of Head of Conservation while Amita and Zintle try to patch things up - until a bomb is dropped.

126.title: Episode #2.126
126.plot: Itumeleng's instincts kick in while Maxine uses the crisis to get closer to him. Karel tries to fix matters with Jack but things don't go as planned. Zintle surrenders to Lebata but disaster strikes.

127.title: Episode #2.127
127.plot: The Van Reenen's struggle to come together as a family. Itumeleng and Marang question Maxine's true motive. The Love Triangle between Amita, Lebata and Zintle seems to be getting more complicated.

128.title: Episode #2.128
128.plot: Marang confronts Zintle about her relationship with Lebata but Zintle has her own plans. Itumeleng has a hard time bonding with his loved ones, while Jack is faced with a disastrous consequence when he disappoints Karel.

129.title: Episode #2.129
129.plot: Zintle feels betrayed by Amita for revealing her secret to Lebata. Maxine is frustrated with Itumeleng and Rossouw for withholding information from her. Meanwhile, Jack tries to make amends with Karel.

130.title: Episode #2.130
130.plot: Itumeleng makes a difficult decision about Nathi's living arrangements while Zintle has mixed emotions about walking the path of temptation. Jack and Angie try to reconnect by being honest with each other, however, Jack messes it up.

131.title: Episode #2.131
131.plot: Nathi goes to his new home while Itumeleng overrules Maxine's plan. Jack is determined to win Angie back as Lebata throws Amita off balance and she has no one to turn too. Lelo decides to bring in a conservation specialist from another country but Itumeleng has to approve.

132.title: Episode #2.132
132.plot: Zintle finds herself in a life or death situation while Maxine plans to sabotage an event. Jack and Angie feel that Tristan's connection to the Reserve seems to follow them and a new addition arrives at the reserve.

133.title: Episode #2.133
133.plot: When Amita collapses, Zintle is forced to turn to an unlikely source for help. Ashwin makes a shocking discovery. The Van Reenens struggle to come to terms with the fact that Tristan might never come back.

134.title: Episode #2.134
134.plot: Marang stumbles on information about Amita and is convinced Itumeleng lied to her. Modise steps in and comforts Nathi while Juma, the new guest, plans to turn things around.

135.title: Episode #2.135
135.plot: Itumeleng comes clean with Marang, but she is concerned about Zintle and Amita's relationship. Jack and Karel have mixed feelings about Juma.

136.title: Episode #2.136
136.plot: Modise is caught between Maxine, Itumeleng and Marang. Juma threatens Itumeleng while Jack keeps having back flashes of Tristan. Marang tries to open up to Zintle - will Zintle tell her the truth?

137.title: Episode #2.137
137.plot: Diksie returns but doesn't get the welcome she was expecting. Angie has a life changing realization. When Amita regains consciousness, she is faced with the reality of her actions, while Marang tries to keep Zintle away from her.

138.title: Episode #2.138
138.plot: Itumeleng tries to help Modise while Ashwin confronts Maxine about Nathi. Blessing's commitment to anti-poaching reaches new heights and Rossouw is called to arrest a poacher. Jack thinks he might still have a chance with Angie.

139.title: Episode #2.139
139.plot: Itumeleng makes a decision about Nathi without telling Maxine and she swears revenge. Karel wants to plan a surprise farewell for Juma, but is worried that Jack and Angie might ruin it. Diksie struggles to fit in at the staff quarters despite Ashwin's attempts to help her.

140.title: Episode #2.140
140.plot: Angie discovers information about Jack's past which puts her in a difficult position and Maxine turns up the heat to set up the brothers against one another. Ashwin's act of kindness towards Diksie backfires badly on him.

141.title: Episode #2.141
141.plot: Amita receives a warm welcome-back from everyone at the lodge, but is worried about her friendship with Zintle. Maxine and Modise's growing alliance frustrates Itumeleng and threatens his relationship with Nathi.

142.title: Episode #2.142
142.plot: Mama Rose warns Modise about Maxine, but can he resist her seduction? Rossouw gets a surprising reaction from Itumeleng on his offer. Will Itumeleng and Nathi mend their relationship after their first big argument or is it too late?

143.title: Episode #2.143
143.plot: Blessing struggles on his own with his anti-poaching program and suggests a candidate for Lelo to recruit. Maxine's control over the Go-Tladi staff leads Marang to take a drastic st Episode. Rossouw feeds Angie false information with hopes of putting a wedge between her and Jack.

144.title: Episode #2.144
144.plot: Amita makes a shocking decision which may not work in Ashwin's favor. Maxine's enjoyment over the Go-Tladi situation is cut short when she makes a surprising discovery about Marang. Will Jack and Angie ever work things out or is it too late for them?

145.title: Episode #2.145
145.plot: Lelo confronts Modise about Maxine's offer and later Itumeleng puts Modise in his place. Angie discovers the lengths that Jack will go to, to keep her away from Tristan. Diksie convinces the rangers to sign a petition.

146.title: Episode #2.146
146.plot: Itumeleng leaves the lodge and Maxine takes advantage of the situation. Angie is shocked by Jack's reaction when she goes on a date.

147.title: Episode #2.147
147.plot: Marang's health is not getting better and Maxine takes advantage of the situation to get closer to Mama Rose. Someone at the lodge gets charged with assault while Diksie's ego is growing since she was appointed to the new position.

148.title: Episode #2.148
148.plot: Bernie, Ashwin and Lindsay confront Marang about Diksie's performance results. Rossouw makes an offer to Jack about the case, but Sarah is suspicious of his motives. Marang's wedding plans are disrupted by a tragic accident which puts Maxine in an unlikely position.

149.title: Episode #2.149
149.plot: Marang's life is in danger. Meanwhile, Bernie takes matters into her own hands after she hears about Diksie's performance appraisal. Jack reacts to Angie and Neil's growing relationship.

150.title: Episode #2.150
150.plot: Rossouw continues to lure Jack, but he is more concerned about a second chance with Angie. Bernie and Ashwin are offended by Diksie's assessment. Marang prepares herself for the test results.

151.title: Episode #2.151
151.plot: Itumeleng is furious to learn what Maxine has been up to and that Marang may have been lying to him. Jack continues to seduce Angie while Rossouw is eager to manipulate Jack. Will Bernie win her fight against Diksie's "Reign of Terror"?

152.title: Episode #2.152
152.plot: With Christmas festivities in full swing the tension is running high at Dinaledi, but Diksie's newly found authority is messing with everyone's mood. Rossouw gives Jack a surprisingly thoughtful gift idea, but his motive is questionable. Maxine plots a dangerous gift swap. Will she get away with it?

153.title: Episode #2.153
153.plot: Nathi's spider goes missing and Maxine takes advantage of the situation. Diksie threatens to bring about a coup among the staff. Sarah convinces Jack to move in with the Van Reneen's, but Karel is not impressed.

154.title: Episode #2.154
154.plot: Modise and Maxine make it hard for Itumeleng's Christmas plans to succeed. Tension is high as the Van Reenen's welcome Jack into their home. Lelo is emotional on Christmas day and can't bear spending the day with anyone. Who will she spend Christmas with?

155.title: Episode #2.155
155.plot: The Lodge comes to a standstill when a staff member goes missing. Itumeleng refuses to be in the middle of Maxine and Marang's conflict anymore. Zintle and Lelo have a heart to heart and Lelo takes Zintle's advice. Bernie makes a shocking decision about her future.

156.title: Episode #2.156
156.plot: Jack is forced to put his New Year's plans for Angie on hold when Ashwin makes a bad call. Itumeleng attempts to use his power over Lelo until he gets a surprising response from her. The news of Bernie's resignation starts to spread.

157.title: Episode #2.157
157.plot: Itumeleng and Modise's family argument reaches boiling point and might ruin everyone's New Year's Eve celebrations. Angie bumps into Neil at the rangers' New Year's Eve party and the tension between them makes Sarah uncomfortable. As midnight approaches, Modise turns up at Lelo's doorstep. Will Modise find the courage to make a move?

158.title: Episode #2.158
158.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

159.title: Episode #2.159
159.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

160.title: Episode #2.160
160.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

161.title: Episode #2.161
161.plot: Karel's plans to confront Jack are disrupted by someone from his past. Itumeleng's relationship with his son gets stronger as he shares values of being a chief. Marang starts to believe that maybe she could be friends with Maxine, but Maxine has fatal plans of her own. Ashwin decides to confront Bernie about staying, but later realizes Bernie has plans of her own.

162.title: Episode #2.162
162.plot: Jack is excited that his Uncle Charles will be visiting but Karel isn't happy about the visit. Itumeleng tries to mend his relationship with Modise, but Lelo interferes. Marang asks Diksie to come up with a plan to persuade Bernie to stay at Dinaledi, but Ashwin comes up with the solution.

163.title: Episode #2.163
163.plot: Uncle Charles seems to have a calming effect on Jack's sour relationship with Karel and gives him advice on women. Bernie is excited to learn MasterChef judge, Chef Benny, will be visiting the Lodge until Neil disrupts her moment. Marang is looking forward to her big day, while Maxine sets her dangerous plans in motion. How far will Maxine go to stop the wedding?

164.title: Episode #2.164
164.plot: Lindsay and Ashwin are excited to meet Chef Benny, but Bernie is nervous to serve him. Uncle Charles cooks for the Van Reenens with plans of bringing the family together and gives Angie something to think about. Marang gets a surprise bridal shower while Itumeleng chills with the guys for his bachelor party. An uninvited Maxine makes a surprise entrance at the bridal shower.

165.title: Episode #2.165
165.plot: Marang finally convinces herself to be excited about her wedding day and that nothing will ruin it. Karel approaches Lelo with a project for restoring the Van Reenen legacy, but is angry when Charles gets involved. Maxine is furious that her plans are disrupted and that the instructions were changed without her knowing. Will Bernie's renewed attitude convince her to stay at the Lodge?

166.title: Episode #2.166
166.plot: The police are called in to assist Itumeleng. Bernie makes a decision about her future at Dinaledi, while Lindsay and Diksie discuss motherhood. Jack and Angie seem to be getting closer, but how long will it last this time? Maxine has her suspicions about who the kidnappers are.

167.title: Episode #2.167
167.plot: Itumeleng takes out his frustrations on the wrong people and leaves Modise and Marang helpless. Angie gets stranded in the bush with guests, but is rescued by an unexpected friend. Bernie confronts Neil about his actions while Angie shows Bernie another side of Neil. Will Bernie eventually fall for Neil's affection?

168.title: Episode #2.168
168.plot: Mama Rose praises Jack for assisting in the delivery of a baby and Angie sees a different side of him. Karel and Charles have a heart-to-heart and Karel assures Charles of his role in the Van Reenen family. Itumeleng is frustrated with the cops for their negligence, but is surprised by Maxine's unexpected information and Marang makes a difficult decision.

169.title: Episode #2.169
169.plot: Itumeleng struggles to find money for the kidnappers but gets a helping hand from an unexpected person. Bernie is surprised at everyone's unhappiness about her decision to leave Dinaledi and is disappointed at Neil's lack of support. Jack is finally happy and positive about his future at the Dinaledi.

170.title: Episode #2.170
170.plot: Itumeleng, Modise and Rossouw finalize details for the ransom drop-off, but Maxine has plans of her own. Uncle Charles starts to inquire about buying the Van Reenen land from the Lebone's behind. Lindsay accuses Bernie of being a coward and that she's making a mistake about Neil.

171.title: Episode #2.171
171.plot: Bernie is filled with guilt about her decision to leave Dinaledi and the uncertainty of her feelings for Neil. Uncle Charles learns about the complexities of the Van Reenen boys while Jack and Angie's first date doesn't go well. A glimmer of hope appears when Rossouw finds the kidnapper's car - but is Nathi still alive? Will they find the kidnappers in time?

172.title: Episode #2.172
172.plot: Itumeleng is increasingly desperate when Nathi's kidnappers do not respond to him after the ransom drop-off. Karel has a bad feeling about his family, but encourages Jack to be honest with Angie and not to give up on love. Bernie decides to take a chance and tell Neil how she really feels, but Neil has plans of his own. Lelo confronts Maxine about her suspicions.

173.title: Episode #2.173
173.plot: Jack and Angie's deep rooted romance is brought back to life, while the relationship between Bernie and Neil seems to cool down after Neil digs into Bernie's romantic past. Itumeleng goes ahead with his plan to launch a public appeal for Nathi's return despite Maxine's reservations. Jack discovers that Charles has been keeping a secret from the Van Reenen family.

174.title: Episode #2.174
174.plot: Ashwin is alarmed when he sees Neil and Lebata engaged in what seems to be an intense conversation and decides to expose them. Modise gets a call from the kidnappers with more demands and Itumeleng loses his cool which frustrates Maxine. Will Uncle Charles reveal his secret to the Van Reneen's?

175.title: Episode #2.175
175.plot: Jack and Angie decide to stop hiding their relationship from their family. Ashwin is keen to find out what Lebata is up to and gets Zintle to investigate on his behalf. The Lodge is brought to a standstill when the police find a body in the river and Itumeleng and Maxine are called in to identify the body.

176.title: Episode #2.176
176.plot: The net is closing in on Doctor Lotz when the kidnapping saga turns dangerous. Uncle Charles makes a life-changing announcement to the Van Reenens while Bernie begins to fear that her dream man is not everything he pretends to be. Find out if Maxine will give into Itumeleng's interrogation about her relationship with Dr Lotz.

177.title: Episode #2.177
177.plot: The tension of waiting is becoming unbearable for the Tladi family until Lotz calls with his final demand. Rossouw fills in the blanks about Dr Lotz's medical career and makes a shocking discovery. Karel refuses to give Charles another chance. Bernie is still trying to work out if Neil is the man for her. Will the Tladi family get Nathi back alive?

178.title: Episode #2.178
178.plot: Itumeleng tells Rossouw about Dr. Lotz's new ransom demands and despite objections, insists on being present when the exchange is made. Bernie learns more about Neil's relationship with Lebata and has second thoughts about leaving. Karel, Jack and Angie are struggling to come to terms with news about Charles. When Maxine learns of Dr Lotz's whereabouts she informs Itumeleng and they unite to save Nathi.

179.title: Episode #2.179
179.plot: Maxine finds herself face-to-face with Doctor Lotz. Itumeleng is ready to take vengeance on his son's kidnapper at the ransom drop off when he receives a tragic call involving Nathi. Angie and Jack decide to get Charles and Karel to talk about his sudden departure. Dinaledi is happy to have their head chef back for good, meanwhile Bernie and Lebata conspire against Neil.

180.title: Episode #2.180
180.plot: Itumeleng tries hard to remain calm despite his dispute with Maxine. The Tladi family awaits Nathi's fate and confront Maxine. Lebata threatens Rossouw and later provokes Jack about his dodgy past. Charles prepares for his departure but Angie wants Charles and Karel to mend their relationship before it's too late.

181.title: Episode #2.181
181.plot: Jack and Angie can't keep their hands off each other. Karel realizes that Lebata wants to close the lodge, but he assures Lelo that he has no skeletons in his closet. Maxine appeals to Marang to convince Itumeleng to let her see Nathi and Marang believes that Itumeleng has gone too far. Zintle tries to bond with her mother, but it seems her efforts are in vain.

182.title: Episode #2.182
182.plot: Neil comes clean about his betrayal , will Bernie trust him again? Itumeleng is angered by Lebata's threats and the brothers agree to fight off Lebata as a team. Jack and Angie reunite and inform Diskie about their new status but Bernie is not supportive of their relationship. Karel confronts Rossouw about Lebata.

183.title: Episode #2.183
183.plot: Itumeleng and Modise's relationship is growing and Itumeleng decides to tell Modise his secret. Karel is delighted when Sarah arrives home but Charles is uncomfortable with her in the house. With Marang out the house, Maxine starts with her plans to seduce Itumeleng and win him back. Amita returns to lodge but not everyone is happy to see her.

184.title: Episode #2.184
184.plot: Ashwin and Amita want to pick up their romance where they left off and Ashwin persuades Amita to tell Itumeleng her secrets. Modise's heavy heart is loosened when Lelo invites him as her partner at a glamorous charity event. Sarah is worried about going into business with Karel and turns to Charles for advice. Diksie's power trip goes too far and puts one of her friendships in trouble.

185.title: Episode #2.185
185.plot: Itumeleng conceals the truth from Marang, but wants to come clean with Nathi. Modise and Lelo reminisce about the first time they met. Jack makes a decision about the future and Charles tells Sarah that he thinks she and Karel will make a good team. Amita reveals to Itumeleng that she has proof about the person that helped to kill Khaya.

186.title: Episode #2.186
186.plot: Lebata puts his cards on the table while Modise and Itumeleng butt heads about letting Lebata back into their lives. Blessing alerts Lelo to a problem between the community and the reserve. Bernie and Diksie refuse to host Lebata and Maxine at dinner, meanwhile Itumeleng makes a call that upsets the staff.

187.title: Episode #2.187
187.plot: Itumeleng is confident that his strategy with Maxine will work, but Modise warns him about Maxine's powers. Nathi is discharged from hospital while Maxine shocks Itumeleng with news of her trip. Sarah lays down the law on what she would expect from a partnership, will Karel accept? Maxine says goodbye.

188.title: Episode #2.188
188.plot: Karel tells Charles about home movie night but Charles is not excited. Rossouw and his team find a burnt car and a ring in the wreck. Modise challenges Itumeleng about continuing a lie. Will Lelo and Modise finally find the spark in their relationship?

189.title: Episode #2.189
189.plot: Ashwin and Bernie investigate clues in their search for Amita, but Ashwin assumes the worst. Sarah is disturbed at a home movie. Marang arrives back from the city to learn that Nathi is in the dark about his mother's whereabouts.

190.title: Episode #2.190
190.plot: Charles fishes about Sarah's reaction to the home movie night and Jack is concerned about his future with Angie. Itumeleng exposes Lebata's motives, will it get in the way of his summit? Itumeleng gives shocking news about Maxine to the community.

191.title: Episode #2.191
191.plot: Lebata prepares a hesitant Blessing to testify at the summit. Karel makes the mistake of sharing his concerns about Sarah with Charles. Marang confronts Itumeleng while Lelo discovers there is more to her relationship with Fana.

192.title: Episode #2.192
192.plot: Lebata's summit begins and it turns very uncomfortable for everyone when he opens up old wounds. Sarah implies to Charles that she knows his secret and she is stunned by his reaction. Will Marang give Lelo and Modise's relationship her blessing?

193.title: Episode #2.193
193.plot: Lebata's plan is disrupted when the Tladi family insist on a tribal hearing. Ashwin finds a link between Amita and Maxine's mysterious death. Angie is shocked by Sarah's revelations while Modise and Lelo continue to rekindle their romance. Are they ready to take the next step?

194.title: Episode #2.194
194.plot: Itumeleng reveals the truth about Nathi to the elders and Marang is not happy with Itumeleng's decision about Nathi. Rossouw tries to convince Angie about Jack's innocence around the poaching saga, but drops a bomb later. Lebata is called to tribal council and Ashwin receives news from a private detective about Amita.

195.title: Episode #2.195
195.plot: Marang confronts Itumeleng about Nathi. Meanwhile, Diksie is excited about Modise moving in with Lelo, but an important issue needs to be resolved for everyone to be happy. Sarah decides to confront her family but Uncle Charles discourages her from getting 'crazy' ideas. She confides in Angie and reveals a shocking secret. Ashwin continues his search for Amita. Will he find her?

196.title: Episode #2.196
196.plot: Marang is not impressed with Itumeleng's disregard for her pregnancy and decides to start an investigation with the help of Ashwin and Rossouw. Angie apologizes to Sarah but her attempt blows up in her face. Sarah confronts Charles and more shocking truths are revealed.

197.title: Episode #2.197
197.plot: Marang and Diksie disagree to the point where a guest finds himself in danger. Zintle is disappointed that Bessing didn't come to her party. Amber arrives at the farm for the holidays and is excited to meet Uncle Charles. Sarah's sudden departure does not sit well with Karel and he questions her motives for leaving. Will Sarah ever come back?

198.title: Episode #2.198
198.plot: Marang's suspicions about Maxine's disappearance drives a Wednesdayge between her and Itumeleng. Karel asks Charles to babysit Amber and he plans a fun filled day for them. Zintle and Blessing track an animal in the bush and discover their relationship has changed, while Ashwin continues with his search to find Amita.

199.title: Episode #2.199
199.plot: Angie puts her job at risk by accusing her boss of bad management. As Charles and Amber's relationship grows stronger she reveals a secret to him. Zintle and Blessing's night watch convinces Blessing to take action. Bernie informs Marang about Ashwin's obsession with Amita and that he may need professional help. Will Ashwin's obsession to find Amita cost him his job at Dinaledi?

200.title: Episode #2.200
200.plot: Marang informs Itumeleng about Ashwin's behavior, but later turns the focus on their relationship and challenges the Kgosi. Modise gives Blessing advice and he makes a brave decision about Zintle. Marang is shaken by Mama Rose's serious warning to delay the wedding. Karel is pleased that Sarah has made contact and Angie decides to babysit Amber so she can investigate Charles' intentions.

201.title: Episode #2.201
201.plot: Sarah arrives out of the blue on the farm and some members of the family are shocked when they discover that she plans to take Amber away. Itumeleng takes Modise's advice, but Marang rejects his efforts and forces him to take a deeper look at their relationship. Charles is faced with the truth and finds himself in a dead-end street. Will Zintle give in to Blessings ultimatum?

202.title: Episode #2.202
202.plot: The family is concerned about Charles and Angie informs Jack about her suspicions. Sarah is involved in a violent confrontation. Itumeleng turns to an unlikely source after Marang makes a decision about their future. The council refuses to bless the Tladi wedding. Will Itumeleng accept their decision?

203.title: Episode #2.203
203.plot: Itumeleng struggles to tell Nathi the truth and Marang gives Itumeleng an ultimatum. She confides in Lelo and Diksie about her wedding plans. The tension between Zintle and Blessings is getting worse until Zintle finds herself in need of Blessing's help. A family member disappears and Karel discovers a life-long secret. A body is discovered in the river.

204.title: Episode #2.204
204.plot: Mama Rose and Mogorosi confront Itumeleng about Marang and Nathi. He decides to tell Nathi the truth, but will he be able to fix his relationship with Marang. The Van Reenens come together to take revenge. The search for the family member is resumed with shocking results.

205.title: Episode #2.205
205.plot: The community gathers to support the Van Reenen family and everyone is concerned about Karel. Itumeleng is caught between the events around Nathi, and being a leader for the community. Zintle is not taking the death of a friend well and calls on a trustworthy friend for comfort. Jack and Angie struggle to get hold of Tristan. Will Jack and Tristan eventually bury their swords?

206.title: Episode #2.206
206.plot: The Van Reneen's prepare for a funeral while the arrival of Kate and Amber unlocks more pain for everybody. The tension between Kate and Angie seems apparent and they realize that they are suffering from the same feelings of guilt. Itumeleng reveals to Diksie that he is relieving Marang of her duties. A new 'permanent' guest arrives at the lodge, but Diksie is not impressed and the battle lines are drawn. Ashwin's luck in finding Amita changes when a stranger tells him of an abandoned car in the bush.

207.title: Episode #2.207
207.plot: Ashwin wakes up disorientated and is shocked to see a murderous 'ghost' from his past. Will Thato be able to convince Diksie about the importance of her role at Dinaledi? The funeral begins and everyone in the community sympathizes and mourns with the Van Reenen family. Despite the royal Wednesdayding taking place tomorrow, Mogorosi and the council stand firm that the Wednesdayding will not have their blessing.

208.title: Episode #2.208
208.plot: Ashwin races against time to save his own life. Angie and Kate confront each other about their affairs and Kate shares a secret with Angie. It's the day of the wedding and Nathi wishes things were different. He makes a shocking discovery at the river and is blindsided into tricking an unsuspecting victim. The elders arrive at Go-Tladi to protest against the wedding and Itumeleng makes a bold decision but a shocking chain of events threatens to ruin the day. Will Itumeleng and Marang finally live happily ever after?

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Dinaledi Lodge prepares for a banquet to celebrate the concession agreement but everyone's world is thrown into crisis when Tiro threatens to sell the land. Tristan convinces Tiro that illegal hunting is going on and that it is an inside job. Bernie has to leave her comfort zone to save the Morula Berry Cake from being a failure for another year.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Tiro's decision to sell the land comes under pressure from both Itumeleng and his own family, and causes ructions amongst the van Reenen's. Lelo is fully expecting Modise to propose, but at the critical moment, nature gets in the way. Bernie's quest for Morula berries leads her down unexplored avenues.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Bernie ventures into the bush with Karel and makes a meaningful connection. Khumo's dodgy life-style impacts on his family and Diksie takes a stand. Itumeleng makes a deal with Tiro to guarantee that he signs the concession agreement.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: The initial spark between Tiro and Lelo grows into an increasing fascination with each other - a fascination which raises eyebrows amongst the guests at the banquet and causes Itumeleng to over-react and get into a fight with Tiro. Bernie's Morula Berry Cake is presented to Kgosi Rratladi.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: The pressure is building on Tristan from both Karel and Kate to ease off on his investigation of the illegal hunting. Under interrogation from Zoe, Lelo finally admits she couldn't say "Yes," to Modise's proposal because she thinks she's met someone else. Isaac Tladi reports in at Dinaledi for his first day as a ranger, and promptly puts Jack's nose out of joint.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Tristan plows on with his investigation, and chooses to confront Itumeleng with the evidence of the dead rhino. Lelo attempts to convince herself that Modise is really the man for her. Isaac undergoes a harsh initiation punishment for stepping on Jack's toes and finds no acceptance from his fellow rangers but he's a hit with the ladies. Itumeleng is stunned when his father collapses in his arms.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Tiro arrives at the Chic Young Designer Awards and Zoe has to run interference. When his guests get out of control, Isaac breaks the ranger code but holds onto his personal code. Bernie steps into the danger zone when she finds the rhino horn.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Isaac takes on orientation and impresses everyone except Jack. Lelo decides that she wants to marry Modise, but that changes when she gets an unexpected visitor. Tristan liberates himself from the pressure of having to find who killed the rhino.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: A hunting party arrives and Jack is tempted to offer them an illegal kill, Modise wants an answer from Lelo. Tristan increases the pressure on Jack while Amber plans a surprise birthday party for Kate.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Kate is drawn into the hunt by Jack, much to Tristan's annoyance, and Jack shifts his focus, to Kate. Tiro can't get Lelo out of his mind, until Marang drops a bomb in his lap.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Jack begins to fear that Bernie could be in real danger from Itumeleng. Jack begins to insinuate his way between Tristan and Kate, which infuriates Tristan. Tiro takes matters into his own hands. Itumeleng tells Khumo to discipline his wife, Diksie, but things don't go according to plan.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Jack cannot help himself: he offers the hunters an illegal Kudu bull. Bernie finally discovers what Itumeleng wants, and realizes she wants the same thing. Lelo has made up her mind, and tells Modise her decision. After Kate's surprise birthday party, Jack makes his intentions clear, leaving Kate stunned.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Lelo barely has time to catch her breath after getting engaged when Itumeleng sets about planning the wedding. Sarah warns Kate against telling Tristan about Jack's kiss. When Jack tries to get rid of the rhino horn he finds himself looking down the barrel of a gun.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Jack negotiates his way out of a dangerous situation while Kate gets an unexpected offer from Itumeleng. Modise and Lelo stand up for themselves but can't help offending those who want to play a part in their wedding. Isaac realizes that satisfying a guest's needs can get personal.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Tristan reveals to Kate the promise of a new dream that she doesn't completely share. Lelo turns Modise around on their marriage plans. Giovanna's theatricality causes more trouble for Isaac with Jack. Tristan realizes the threat of rhino poaching is a long way from over.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: With pressure mounting on the engaged couple, Lelo admits that she hasn't been open with her family about Modise and then lies to herself about Tiro. Tristan invigorates his passion for the white lion project and puts aside his tensions with Karel. Isaac gets pulled into Giovanna's seductive cobweb and finds her impossible to resist.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Diksie, seeing more sparks between Itumeleng and Bernie, believes there's a hot attraction between them. In the midst of Tristan's passion for his white lion project Kate reveals her real fears to Sarah. After being teased and questioned by his siblings, Tiro decides an attack strategy is the best way to move on from Lelo.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: The lack of privacy at the lodge corners Itumeleng into telling Bernie they can't be together, but Bernie has other ideas. After taking out his frustration on the camera trap, Jack uses it as a gauntlet to lay down another challenge to Tristan, who is finding Karel a handful as a business partner.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Head ranger Jack stays one step ahead of nemesis Tristan, while Lelo debates whether to attend Tiro's dinner party and the White Lion Project hits a few road bumps because of Karel's cold feet.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Tension mounts for the Lebone family as the night of Tiro's party arrives and Tiro has to deal with seeing Lelo on Modise's arm as his fiancé. Isaac discovers that Jack and Giovanna's encounter was much more innocent than Jack makes out and he finally has Jack on the back foot.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Tristan realizes he has to tell Karel he has to be excluded from the white lion project. After avoiding the issue with Marang, Tiro tries to make contact with Lelo. Marang brings someone new into the Lebone house while Bernie and Itumeleng continue their hot affair in secret.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Tristan tells Karel he has to be excluded from the white lion project, and gets an unexpected response. Tiro makes contact with Lelo and tells her he is not giving up on her. Bernie is furious with Itumeleng for breaking their deal, and Diksie points out a few home truths to Marang.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: With an important event being hosted at the lodge - and a difficult critic - people are tense. When Nick leaves the lodge in the lurch, Bernie has an opportunity to step in and shine. She also takes the opportunity to test her boundaries with Itumeleng, but will she push him too far? Meanwhile Kate is encouraged in her quest for independence by Karel.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Marang shares the secret of her divorce with Hope. Kate realizes that balancing her newly revived career with her marriage to Tristan is going to be far from easy, and Bernie fights to claim the top spot in the lodge's kitchen.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: Karel and Tristan form an uneasy alliance, but Kate is feeling increasingly offended by Tristan's lack of understanding. Marang is propelled by Hope's predicament and gets a break when Mama Rose suggests a possible course of action. Itumeleng tells Bernie they have to cool their relationship in order to make Bernie's promotion plausible.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Marang gets served divorce papers and shares with Hope why she is the "defendant". Tristan and Kate keep missing each other and their conflict threatens to boil over. Khumo prepares for his interview with Bernie and is pleasantly surprised by what he encounters.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: The tension between Tristan and Kate increases, and Amber starts to feel the effects of the worsening domestic situation. Itumeleng overrides Khumo's appointment process and appoints Bernie as Head Chef. Lelo does her best to respect Modise's needs.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Kate is stuck in the middle of nowhere, and her attempts to connect with Tristan fail. Tristan finally learns something has happened, and the race is on to rescue Kate. Itumeleng takes matters into his own hands regarding the troublesome Tomas, but will he go too far in solving the problem?

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: Tristan and Jack both race to save Kate, but only one will get there on time. Bernie can't contain her jealousy when an old flame of Itumeleng's arrives. Itumeleng confronts Lelo about Tiro.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Lelo is pushed to an extreme decision about her relationship with Modise. Marang makes an astonishing confession to her family. Kate finally tells Tristan the truth about what she is feeling.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: Itumeleng forces Modise to make a decision about Lelo, then fights his urge to be a part of whatever Ayanda is putting together. The Lebone's rally around Marang, and she finds the courage to challenge Zweli's demands in the divorce hearing. Lelo regrets tossing the Tladi ring into the dam.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: As the staff gossip about the big break up, Modise appears to be falling apart, but his binge causes him to finally stand up to Itumeleng. Tristan warns Kate of Itumeleng and Jack. Zoe cannot comfort Lelo, who is at her lowest. Marang warns Khumo and Diksie to keep Lelo's situation a secret from Tiro.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: When Tiro learns of Modise and Lelo's break-up, he acts immediately, despite the problems this causes with his family. Modise, meanwhile, tries to figure out whether Lelo is right for him. Itumeleng undermines Jack and it seems that tension between the two could be dangerous for both.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: Tiro encourages his sister to fight for her kids, while he continues to fight for Lelo. Bernie and Itumeleng reach a stalemate in their relationship due to the cunning and enigmatic presence of Ayanda. Modise and Lelo make a very tough decision.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: Itumeleng is still resisting Ayanda's attempts to seduce him - both professionally and personally. She turns up the heat by forcing a confrontation Itumeleng is sure to hate. Marang struggles to decide what to do about her children, until she gets advice from an old friend. Modise isn't taking his breakup with Lelo very well and has to lean on Zoe as a friend.

36.title: Episode #1.36
36.plot: Ayanda oversteps the mark and Itumeleng realizes it is time for her to go. Zoe and Modise try to make sense of their gigantic mistake and Lelo has shocking news for Modise. It seems Kate may have friends from her past descending on her, and she's not sure if she wants that.

37.title: Episode #1.37
37.plot: Itumeleng and Dinaledi Lodge face a staffing crisis after a bridge is closed. Lelo and Tiro decide to take things to the next level, while Modise comes to terms with the breakup. Kate has a crisis of faith.

38.title: Episode #1.38
38.plot: The Dinaledi staff are becoming tired and overworked and Khumo's attempts to keep everything running smoothly puts him in conflict with Mama Rose. Kate is still anxious about being with all her old friends and finds it hard to join in the fun, especially when it becomes clear that Jack and Paula are attracted to each other. Itumeleng has to decide how far he'll go to make sure a wealthy and important guest doesn't go to another Lodge.

39.title: Episode #1.39
39.plot: Tiro's unwavering in his love for Lelo, even against Marang's vehement opposition. Kate butts heads with Tristan when he finds out that she is not proud of her family and who she has become. Itumeleng is frustrated by the fact that the bridge is not repaired yet, and he passes the responsibility of managing the staff to Khumo because he has other fish to fry.

40.title: Episode #1.40
40.plot: Lelo arrives at the Lebone house to spend the day, but it is quickly apparent that Marang is not happy about it. During an outing with a few of her friends, Kate realizes that Karel understands her situation. But will she make peace with her place? Itumeleng is under huge pressure with the bridge crisis and a client with an impossible demand. How far will he have to go to please him?

41.title: Episode #1.41
41.plot: Dinaledi lodge is still not running at full tilt, and with a demanding VIP guest on the books Khumo and Itumeleng have their hands full. Marang starts to see the fallout of her pending divorce first hand when her son gets in trouble. Jack tries to keep Itumeleng's illegal hunting venture below the radar.

42.title: Episode #1.42
42.plot: Jack and Isaac experience the beginnings of an unlikely, but mutual understanding and respect as they prepare for a hunt. Marang makes little progress with her son, and has to entrust him to an unlikely person - Khumo. Itumeleng is far from rid of Ayanda. Her ambition brings her back and she is not letting go.

43.title: Episode #1.43
43.plot: Jack finally spots leopard tracks, but he has to deal with Isaac's suspicions about the legitimacy of the leopard hunt. Khumo brings in an old acquaintance to entertain DeSantos, and she puts a strain on his marriage. Tuelo starts his work experience at the lodge.

44.title: Episode #1.44
44.plot: DeSantos gets his prize but Isaac learns that hunting at Dinaledi is far more complicated than it seems. Tuelo finally confronts Marang about her divorce. Diksie seems to take Lindsay and Bernie's advice about how to deal with Khumo, but neither of them expect her to actually remain calm.

45.title: Episode #1.45
45.plot: Isaac finds himself conflicted by the illegal hunting of a female leopard. Marang gets advice from Itumeleng that helps her restore her relationship with Tuelo. But then he destroys it all again. Khumo and Diksie's marriage hits an even bigger snag.

46.title: Episode #1.46
46.plot: Isaac sinks deeper and deeper into the lies that bind him, Itumeleng and Jack, and his life is forever changed. No matter how much Itumeleng resists, Ayanda is determined to bring him to his knees. Khumo flounders without Diksie, and she shows no sign of forgiving him.

47.title: Episode #1.47
47.plot: Kate's friend Nina comes to visit the Van Reenen's and Kate realizes that she's happy with her life. Lelo and Zoe's friendship continues to unravel, due to Zoe's one night stand with Modise. Itumeleng and Ayanda begin their campaign to win the tender for the Kwena bridge, and Ayanda tells Itumeleng to approach his father for community buy-in.

48.title: Episode #1.48
48.plot: After the failed pitch to Rratladi, Ayanda feels Itumeleng has betrayed her chances of grabbing the tender for the bridge, so she gets revenge via Modise. Kate learns exactly what Nina has planned for her, and she is stunned. Diksie thinks she has finally got through to Khumo when he surprises her with a demand of his own. Tiro invites Lelo to his house for the weekend.

49.title: Episode #1.49
49.plot: The Tladi Brothers almost go to war over an increasingly manipulative Ayanda. Kate finds it hard to tell her husband that she wants to go, while Tristan finds it even harder to let her go. Marang and Lelo fight for the queen bee position in the Lebone aka Tiro House.

50.title: Episode #1.50
50.plot: Modise plays along with Ayanda's games to collect info for Itumeleng. Marang makes Lelo's life hell which Tiro counters by offering Marang a job. Tristan's attitude drives Nina away, and Kate decides to follow her. Khumo and Diksie learn about love from an unexpected source.

51.title: Episode #1.51
51.plot: Humo and Diksie restore the German couple's faith in love and marriage, learning a lesson about their own relationship along the way. Amber tries to fill her mother's shoes and proves to Tristan that they can cope on their own. Modise tells Itumeleng that Tiro is also tendering for the bridge contract, and Itumeleng does not take it well.

52.title: Episode #1.52
52.plot: Lelo still feels like an outsider in the Lebone family and this isolation is only made worse when Marang's divorce comes through and everyone rallies around her. Now that Modise has revealed to Itumeleng that Ayanda is trying, once again, to manipulate the Tladis, Itumeleng orders Modise to have no further contact with her - but Modise has his own ideas. Kate finally returns to the van Reenen farm, but she's got some startling news.

53.title: Episode #1.53
53.plot: Kate struggles to reconcile her dreams with the pressure of her big news. Khumo is so wrapped up in lodge business that he cannot see that Diksie has other things on her mind that she needs to discuss with him. Tiro and Lelo are caught up in the intimacies of their relationship.

54.title: Episode #1.54
54.plot: Kate tries to come to terms with everything, and Tristan tells Blessing his big news. Lelo and Zoe are pitted against one another in a battle for a promotion. Diksie and Khumo must put their marital problems aside in order to identify a respected critic.

55.title: Episode #1.55
55.plot: A possible promotion at Chic magazine threatens Zoe and Lelo's already fragile relationship. Khumo and the lodge staff continue to hunt for the mysterious and elusive lodge reviewer. And Kate grows more and more ambivalent much to the delight of Jack.

56.title: Episode #1.56
56.plot: Lelo learns something about herself at work and she and Tiro finally consummate their relationship. Kate's big secret is a secret no more, and she melts with uncertainty during a celebration. After much sleuthing Diksie, believes she knows the reviewer's identity - but the truth is not what she expected at all.

57.title: Episode #1.57
57.plot: Tiro persuades Lelo to forgive Zoe and not take the job, however she just can't seem to back down. Tristan tries to get the truth out of Kate about how she really feels, however when she finally tells him, it's not what he wants to hear. Khumo, Diksie, Lindsay and Bernie are so sure about who the five star reviewer is, they overlook any other possibilities.

58.title: Episode #1.58
58.plot: A visit from Kate's friend Nina serves to highlight Kate's mixed feelings about her pregnancy, causing a wide rift between Kate and Tristan. Diksie feels Khumo is too insensitive to her needs, and it appears that the staff have ruined their chances of getting a five-star review.

59.title: Episode #1.59
59.plot: Kate won't let go of her dream to go to the design course, thus deepening tensions with Tristan. In 'winning' the promotion at Chic, Lelo considers quitting and is seduced by Tiro's offer to buy her her own magazine. Itumeleng orders Jack to make Isaac part of the hunting detail. Isaac suspects Itumeleng is grooming him to replace Jack.

60.title: Episode #1.60
60.plot: Lelo's new promotion doesn't go as well as she thought. Unable to resolve his conflict with Isaac, Jack takes him out in the bush for a little unofficial discipline. Amber begins 'acting out' and things finally come to a head when Kate makes her decision.

61.title: Episode #1.61
61.plot: Itumeleng comes clean to his father, and RraTladi takes away the one thing that matters most to Itumeleng. Tiro, who is a bit at sea after his fight with Lelo, finds himself accepting an unusual challenge from Tristan. Lelo is forced to play her hand by a defiant Zoe, and finds herself in a difficult situation with Rosie, who no longer trusts her.

62.title: Episode #1.62
62.plot: Tiro heads into the bush with Blessing and Tristan, in an attempt to win a bet. Karel voices his concerns about his family to Marang, during a visit to the Kwena bridge. Lelo's new job increases the tension between her and Zoe, until Zoe makes a rash decision.

63.title: Episode #1.63
63.plot: Marang, Blessing, and Tristan push a determined Tiro to the limits in the bush. A conflicted Itumeleng has to do a balancing act between the lucrative bridge tender and appeasing his father. Meanwhile Lelo realizes that business and friendship don't mix. Kate gets unexpected support from her family in pursuit of her dream job while Mama Rose seeks Itumeleng's council regarding Isaac's foul mood.

64.title: Episode #1.64
64.plot: Tristan takes a big step forward with his white lion project, just as he and Kate get bad news, news which leaves Kate with an enormous choice. Tiro believes he has uncovered his new passion, and makes it clear Lelo is part of that dream. Isaac takes on his mother about more than her current meddling.

65.title: Episode #1.65
65.plot: RraTladi has a dream that foreshadows the fall of the Tladi family. Kate falls into a deep depression. Lelo has Chic and Rosie under control until Zoe returns. Tiro undermines Marang when he gives the bridge tender his full commitment. Tristan gets a mysterious envelope, the contents of which could bring Itumeleng and the Lodge down once and for all.

66.title: Episode #1.66
66.plot: Tiro and Tristan try to work out why they've been sent a picture of Itumeleng on a leopard hunt and what it might mean for their poaching investigation. Itumeleng hears that Tiro is now personally taking over the Lebone bid for the Kwena bridge tender and decides to do his own bid over again, cutting profit even more. Kate and Tristan seem to have adjusted to their new circumstances, much to Jack's chagrin.

67.title: Episode #1.67
67.plot: Itumeleng manipulates Marang into betraying Tiro. Tiro reveals his plan to flush Itumeleng out of his hole and expose the illegal hunting. Kate finds herself frustrated by Tristan's lack of commitment once more, and she treats herself to some fun of her own. Zoe can't help herself, and proves she still has it when she pulls off an office coup.

68.title: Episode #1.68
