68.plot: RraTladi's dreams are confirmed: the Tladi family is in danger. Itumeleng is exposed and his world begins to fall apart. All Kate's careful plans to get her relationship back on track are dealt another severe blow. Lelo and Zoe are stunned by Rosie's ability to do the unexpected.

69.title: Episode #1.69
69.plot: Tristan rocks the family boat again by disappointing Kate and Amber, ultimately bringing them closer to Jack. Lelo and Zoe are committed to bringing down their common foe, Rosie. And problems begin to mount for Itumeleng as he faces formidable and unexpected challenges from Tiro, and RraTladi.

70.title: Episode #1.70
70.plot: When Modise is sent to the lodge to do damage control, Mama Rose fully understands the implications of RraTladi's dream of the "Danger from Within". Kate is in denial about her feelings for Jack but when Poppy propositions him, she realizes the true extent of her jealousy. Rosie draws Lelo deeper into her web and suggests that there is something big on Lelo's horizon.

71.title: Episode #1.71
71.plot: Modise realizes he has been brought here to keep an eye on Itumeleng. RraTladi lets Mama Rose in on his thoughts about the future of the chieftancy, and they are dark. Rosie makes a surprise visit and stuns Lelo and Tiro with two separate offers. Lelo also stands up to Marang. Kate begs Tristan to come home but he has his own bad news to deal with. Meanwhile Jack continues to circle.

72.title: Episode #1.72
72.plot: Kate and Tristan drift farther apart leading her to do the unthinkable with Jack. Marang confesses her betrayal to Tiro. Lelo confronts Rosie about her attempts to seduce Tiro, and a slighted Itumeleng lashes out at RraTladi, causing his father to suffer greatly.

73.title: Episode #1.73
73.plot: Itumeleng refuses to right his wrongs and go to his ailing father's bedside. Kate and Jack fall for each other even further, while Tristan begins to suspect something is up. Lelo swallows her pride and returns to work.

74.title: Episode #1.74
74.plot: Kate tries to deal with her guilty conscience. Her guilt impacts on her relationship with Tristan, and she breaks it off with Jack. Tiro calls off his campaign against Itumeleng, at the request of Marang. Itumeleng, overcome with guilt at his role in his father's illness, keeps his distance from his family causing the community to question his love for his father.

75.title: Episode #1.75
75.plot: Itumeleng receives exactly what he wanted, at precisely the wrong time. Kate and Jack reinstate their affair on the day that Tristan's dream comes to fruition. Tiro tries to make Lelo understand why he is so connected to this land, and why he wants to change and make his life out here, but the pull of the city gets in the way.

76.title: Episode #1.76
76.plot: Modise agrees to help Itumeleng but lays down some ground rules that shift the balance of power in their relationship. Kate encourages Tristan to spend time with Eva, his new lioness, to make her feel less guilty about her affair with Jack. Meanwhile Karel senses that something is up with Kate and confronts Tristan about it. Lelo knows that she can't have both, and may have to choose between Tiro and the magazine.

77.title: Episode #1.77
77.plot: Modise starts to show more and more leadership qualities. Karel reveals his suspicions of her affair to Kate. Rratladi ponders his own mortality and the future of his family and community. And Lelo and Tiro put their relationship on hold.

78.title: Episode #1.78
78.plot: RraTladi continues to recover, but confides that the future of the community is still uncertain. Although experiencing private doubts about his successor, he firmly endorses Itumeleng as future chief. Tiro embarks on a campaign to undermine Itumeleng's succession. Lelo is torn between her career and Tiro. Kate manages to convince Karel that his fears about her infidelities are unfounded, while continuing her affair with Jack. Then Lindsay discovers the affair.

79.title: Episode #1.79
79.plot: Tiro gives Lelo the space she needs to make a crucial career decision. He refuses to get involved in the decision and they agree she has to make it on her own. But help arrives from an unexpected source. Modise proposes a new venture that he hopes will unite all three families, but Tristan has other ideas. Bernie and Lindsay confront Jack and try and force him to end the affair with Kate.

80.title: Episode #1.80
80.plot: Lelo resigns from Chic. Bernie and Lindsay threaten to expose Jack and Kate. After hitting brick walls with Jack and Isaac, Modise presents Itumeleng with evidence of illegal hunting at Dinaledi.

81.title: Episode #1.81
81.plot: Modise reveals that he is a better man than Itumeleng when he organizes a clan feast in honor of RraTladi. Marang's antagonism grows when Tiro refuses to attend RraTladi's feast. When Lindsay discovers that Kate has ignored her ultimatum she confronts her. Kate stands strong and accuses Lindsay of wanting to destroy her marriage because she has the hots for her husband.

82.title: Episode #1.82
82.plot: Itumeleng continues to distance himself from his father, while Modise becomes closer to the old man. Lindsay tells Karel shocking news about Kate and Jack.

83.title: Episode #1.83
83.plot: Khumo decides it's high time he was promoted to General Manager of the lodge. Karel talks Kate out of coming clean to Tristan, and instead she blurts out that she's going to have a boy. Marang looks to Itumeleng for help about the Lelo problem. While Isaac and Modise strengthen their positions in the Tladi family, Itumeleng becomes more of an outsider.

84.title: Episode #1.84
84.plot: Itumeleng is distracted from the party preparations by Khumo's bid for promotion, and Jack's threats to expose him. Under pressure, Jack still plans to flee Dinaledi, and pushes Kate to join him. RraTladi finally confides to Mama Rose that he doesn't want Itumeleng to be chief. The chief and Itumeleng have an explosive confrontation at the party.

85.title: Episode #1.85
85.plot: Having watched while his father died, Itumeleng tries to assert his control over the community, then Modise starts asking questions about what really happened in the moments before his father's death. Jack survives the shooting and manages to get help on Kate's doorstep. Mama Rose doesn't know how she'll survive without the man she loved. The Lebone's fear the LeboneTladi feud will flare up again.

86.title: Episode #1.86
86.plot: Modise can't shake the feeling that his father's death was far from natural. Khumo and Diksie find it hard to conceal their possible pregnancy. Jack's presence in the Van Reenen home unsettles both Karel and Tristan, while he tries to figure out who shot him. Mama Rose confides in her son about the Tladi's true heir apparent.

87.title: Episode #1.87
87.plot: Diksie comes to terms with how much she wants a baby. RraTladi's body is returned home and Bernie turns Itumeleng down when he tries to seduce her. Jack is resolved to confront the man who shot him but has he identified the correct suspect?

88.title: Episode #1.88
88.plot: RraTladi is buried. A grief stricken Mama Rose shares a personal secret to Modise and after hearing some disturbing news, Modise, now beliefs that his father's death wasn't an accident. Tiro tells Lelo they will have to live apart until he has found another elder to negotiate for her on his behalf. Kate escapes Jack by going away with Tristan. Diksie gets her results about her pregnancy.

89.title: Episode #1.89
89.plot: Modise wrestles with Mama Rose's revelation - his father wanted him to become the next chief. Tiro and Lelo find a relative to represent the Lebone family and move forward with their wedding plans. And Karel struggles to find a minder for Amber.

90.title: Episode #1.90
90.plot: Modise gets on the wrong side of Mogorosi, not knowing that Mogorosi might side with Itumeleng. Jack finally discovers the identity of his shooter. Lindsay connects to Amber using their shared experience of braces. Lelo fails to win over Uncle Whatnot and panics when Tiro tells her she must cook a meal to impress him.

91.title: Episode #1.91
91.plot: Jacks paranoia increases as Blessing reveals the identity of the man in the camera trap image. Itumeleng promises Isaac a position of power when he becomes chief, which brings Isaac into further conflict with Rose. Rose and Modise continue their campaign to win over the elders, forcing Modise to compromise his ethics. Uncle Whatnot throws the Lebone house into turmoil, forcing Lelo to act.

92.title: Episode #1.92
92.plot: Itumeleng learns more about the betrayal that is crippling his attempts to become chief. Mama Rose and Modise realize Itumeleng is ahead of them in the race. Karel allows Jack to stay longer but Jack has brought danger to the Van Reenen farmhouse. Lelo pulls off a coup by keeping Uncle whatnot on track.

93.title: Episode #1.93
93.plot: Lindsay and Amber continue to bond famously, while Karel slyly encourages Jack to look for his future elsewhere. Diksie becomes the groupie to a superstar, while Itumeleng explodes and makes a drastic decision about Mama Rose, and a revelation about his father's death, within ear shot of the wrong man.

94.title: Episode #1.94
94.plot: In the wake of Mama Rose being fired and Lindsay going missing, Dinaledi struggles to meet the demands of a temperamental Bollywood actress. While Itumeleng wrestles with the guilt he feels over his father's death, Modise vows that he will not let Itumeleng become chief. Jack stares death in the face for a second time.

95.title: Episode #1.95
95.plot: Itumeleng evicts Modise from the lodge and in so doing declares war, but Modise will not take his lightly. Karel saves Jack's life and they have to work together to get rid of the evidence. Diksie tames "the princess" but her success is short lived.

96.title: Episode #1.96
96.plot: Karel and Jack lie to Lindsay about the events of the previous evening. Jack is overcome with guilt, and Karel offers him comfort. Diksie confronts Jiah, the difficult guest - with a surprising outcome. Tiro agrees to help Modise take on Itumeleng. Itumeleng vows to defend his chieftaincy.

97.title: Episode #1.97
97.plot: Itumeleng lures Modise into the bush for a showdown, but only one of them has a gun. Karel calls the cops in and Rossouw identifies the owner of the burnt out bakkie, then he decides to call Jack in for questioning. Diksie throws Khumo a curve ball when Jiah invites Diksie to stay in a neighboring chalet as her VIP guest.

98.title: Episode #1.98
98.plot: Itumeleng and Modise form a fragile truce. Diksie's behavior as a guest makes her the new Diva. Mama Rose attempts to get her job back. Kate reacts to the news of who has actually been taking care of Amber, and Jack becomes a murder suspect.

99.title: Episode #1.99
99.plot: Itumeleng and Modise agree to put aside their differences for the good of the Tladi clan but come up against fierce opposition from Mama Rose. Karel tries to get jack out of hot water. The gloves come off between Lindsay and Kate as Kate gets territorial with her family. And Diksie the Guest from Hell reconnects with her friends and colleagues the Bollywood way.

100.title: Episode #1.100
100.plot: Itumeleng and Modise's uneasy truce allows Mama Rose to return to work. Diksie's taste of the high life comes to an end when Jiah leaves the lodge. Kate reveals a dark side when she realizes that Lindsay has been spending time with Karel and Amber.

101.title: Episode #1.101
101.plot: Itumeleng decides to rekindle his affair with Bernie. Mama Rose locks horns with Marang and Isaac over their loyalties concerning Itumeleng. Isaac has officially taken over as head ranger, and strangely, Jack seems to be happy with that. Lelo officially moves in with all her boxes of clothes, much to Marang's dissatisfaction.

102.title: Episode #1.102
102.plot: Jack wants to lie low but Kate and Tristan are determined to send him packing. Bernie is considering re-starting her relationship with Itumeleng when Marang sideswipes her thinking. Tiro agrees to Lelo's plans for redecorating their bedroom, and soon Lelo has plans for the whole house.

103.title: Episode #1.103
103.plot: Bernie and Itumeleng continue to deny their feelings for each other. Lindsay suffers from post-traumatic stress, and finds an unlikely friend. Modise gets further embroiled in Isaac and Mama Rose's fight. Tristan makes a stand regarding Jack, and Lelo takes over the Lebone household.

104.title: Episode #1.104
104.plot: Itumeleng sets a trap for Jack and he walks straight into it. Isaac has the chance to clear Jack's name but sells him out to Rossouw instead. Itumeleng rewards Isaac with the Head Ranger position. Bernie realizes she and Itumeleng have no future together and Lelo and Marang's War of the Lounges forces Tiro to choose between them.

105.title: Episode #1.105
105.plot: Was Jack framed, his innocence still hangs in the balance. Itumeleng asks Marang to oversee a Black Tie event at Dinaledi - she is flattered and accepts the challenge. Lindsay is delighted when Diksie's absence leads to a temporary promotion, will she live up to the challenge?

106.title: Episode #1.106
106.plot: Jack confronts Itumeleng. Marang realizes that she may have bitten off more than she can chew organizing the Black Tie Event, however she finds an unlikely ally. The Bridge project is threatened by a worker's revolt. Find out how Lindsay's new promotion is turning out.. - while Isaac tries to deal with the gift and the curse of being the official head ranger.

107.title: Episode #1.107
107.plot: Incriminating evidence is found in Jack's room. Jack is suspended and ordered to get off the reserve pending a disciplinary hearing. Marang's event starts to come together. The Lebone's receive bad news about Diksie's mother. Lelo boosts Lindsay's confidence when her colleagues make fun of her new look.

108.title: Episode #1.108
108.plot: Dinaledi plays host to the rich and fabulous, as the day of Marang's party finally arrives. But Marang's elation at her success is tempered by the arrival of an unexpected guest - Idols star Sindi Nene. Jack seeks refuge. The success of the Kwena bridge project is threatened. Itumeleng promises may come back to haunt him.

109.title: Episode #1.109
109.plot: Itumeleng is desperate for funds. Jack tells all to Tristan. Marang is torn between a job offer and Zweli wanting her back. Itumeleng crushes Lindsay's ambitions.

110.title: Episode #1.110
110.plot: Itumeleng manipulates a staff member further into being his pawn. Marang feels pressured about making a decision about her future. Lindsay is haunted by her past while helping Lelo with her wedding. And Jack takes a drastic step.

111.title: Episode #1.111
111.plot: The completion of the Kwena Bridge is under threat. Itumeleng hatches a devious plot. Marang's choices are getting more and more difficult. Karel convinces someone close to him to go to the police. The relationship between Tristan and Lindsay deepens.

112.title: Episode #1.112
112.plot: Tiro is furious at Marang. Itumeleng makes an announcement that shocks everybody. Bernie discovers that Itumeleng has finally moved on. Kate's insecurities about Tristan continue to grow.

113.title: Episode #1.113
113.plot: Marang and Zweli struggle to rekindle their marriage. The new host Ashwin arrives and ruffles a few feathers. Lindsay continues to pursue Tristan, while Jack fails to prove his innocence. Itumeleng gets an unexpected surprise.

114.title: Episode #1.114
114.plot: Itumeleng confronts Jack. Marang makes a life-changing decision, but is it the right one? Lindsay and Bernie both secretly vie for the attention of Ashwin, the gorgeous new Front of House Manager.

115.title: Episode #1.115
115.plot: Kate and Tristan suspect someone close to them of a burglary and want that person gone. Jack has won the favor of Karel who will do anything to bring his enemy down. Karel confronts Lindsay but Lindsay stands her ground. Kate realizes Tristan lied to her about Lindsay and gives him an ultimatum. Tiro warms to the idea of Marang's life changing decision, while a promise to Lindsay is broken.

116.title: Episode #1.116
116.plot: Jack's attempts to get a confession leads to catastrophic consequences. Marang wises up to a friend's past and makes a drastic decision about her future. After a night of passion Bernie's left wondering where exactly she stands.

117.title: Episode #1.117
117.plot: With Kate's life on a thread, Tristan is forced to make a difficult choice. Jack blames himself for Kate's misfortune, and his guilt is compounded when he has to tell Amber. A sombre cloud descends on Dinaledi and Lindsay and Isaac both grapple with feelings of guilt. Itumeleng seizes an opportunity to get rid of some of the evidence against him.

118.title: Episode #1.118
118.plot: Tristan reels in shock as Kate fights for her life. Karel is furious when he finds out the part that Jack played in Kate's misfortune. Jack is convinced of an individual's guilt but has no proof. Zweli realizes that it's finally over between him and an ex. Lindsay feels responsible for what happened to Kate.

119.title: Episode #1.119
119.plot: Will Kate regains her consciousness? The arrival of VIP guests threatens to unsettle the newly appointed Ashwin, much to Lindsay's secret delight. Isaac wants to know the truth about Kate's misfortune but Itumeleng shuts him down.

120.title: Episode #1.120
120.plot: Tristan has a change of heart regarding Jack and his life is changed forever. Marang struggles to define her relationship with her family, but she has found a new decisiveness. Isaac finds his authority being undermined by Ashwin's lies.

121.title: Episode #1.121
121.plot: Tristan suffers while Tiro doesn't appreciate that Lelo is serious about learning to cook. Lelo secretly enlists the help of a rather reluctant cook. Isaac goes on a shopping spree and Ashwin uses this as further ammunition.

122.title: Episode #1.122
122.plot: Lelo starts to sneak around on a friend for a good cause. Isaac and an enemy's feud escalates. The Van Reenen family start to fall apart, while a friend is forced to relive a tragic moment.

123.title: Episode #1.123
123.plot: Kate blames herself while Tristan struggles to reach out to her. Tristan's unstable emotions give Tiro an advantage in an important project. Itumeleng presses ahead with plans for an official launch of the Kwena Bridge. At the lodge, Isaac is forced to deal with the troublesome VIP guests. His troubles are compounded by a host's determined attempts to undermine him.

124.title: Episode #1.124
124.plot: Despite attempts to reach out to each other, Kate and Tristan's relationship is rocky. Karel takes matters into his own hands. Isaac is the only one who doesn't find an employee's pranks funny and tensions run high amongst the rangers. A host sets his sights on one of the guests. Lelo's efforts to learn to cook end in disaster.

125.title: Episode #1.125
125.plot: An old and good friend of Kate's comes to her rescue - much to Tristan's dismay. An Elder visits the lodge and fuels Itumeleng's fire to be crowned. Dinaledi and a VIP guest continue to flirt, while he and Nelson plot against Isaac. Tiro and a fellow employees' working relationship is put to the test, while Mama Rose's dark past is threatened to be exposed.

126.title: Episode #1.126
126.plot: Tristan doesn't come home and misses an important interview with the press. He struggles to reach out to Kate. Nina doubts whether her efforts are making a difference. Modise questions Peter's decision concerning the signing off of the bridge. The secret Mogorosi eluded too, causes strain between Isaac and a close family member. Isaac goes to a friend for advice.

127.title: Episode #1.127
127.plot: Tristan's denial spirals out of control with possible disastrous consequences. Mogorosi is forced to lie when he's pressed for information about Isaac's father. Isaac thinks he's finally found a leopard for the Khumalos, but an enemy and Nelson are one step ahead of him.

128.title: Episode #1.128
128.plot: Itumeleng and the community celebrate the bridge opening. Itumeleng revels in his success and draws two family members closer to him. Meanwhile the feud between Mama Rose and an elder reaches a head. Kate wants out. Amber overhears her and takes drastic action.

129.title: Episode #1.129
129.plot: The shattered Van Reenens and the entire community mount a full scale search for Amber. Isaac continues relentlessly to dig up his family's past, as a close family friend struggles to keep it buried. And Bernie fights her mixed up feelings for a philandering friend.

130.title: Episode #1.130
130.plot: Tristan makes a decision that leaves Kate out of the loop. Karel tells Kate about the day Tristan met her. In her ever failing attempts to conceal the truth, Mama Rose discovers a curious turn of events concerning RraTladi's will. Bernie's jealousy gets the better of her.

131.title: Episode #1.131
131.plot: Kate is forced to evaluate her life choices. The Tladis prepare for the reading of their father's will. Bernie's attempted revenge plot backfires.

132.title: Episode #1.132
132.plot: After discovering a secret that could change Itumeleng's life, a worrisome Itumeleng is caught between a rock and a hard place . Mama Rose worries about a dark secret she has been trying to conceal all these years. Itumeleng cons three attendants from the will reading. A good friend plays Bernie at her own game.

133.title: Episode #1.133
133.plot: Zoe arrives at the lodge with a mysterious man. Tristan and Kate start rebuilding their marriage - Jack feels excluded and Karel suggests he take charge of his life. Itumeleng is determined to see the will before anyone else. Modise and Itumeleng struggle to keep up pretenses with Isaac and Mama Rose, who vows to protect her son.

134.title: Episode #1.134
134.plot: Itumeleng has plans with his father's will, while RraTladi's lawyer is caught up in the Tladi feud. Tiro hits it off with Zoe's rich fiancé , while Lelo views the man and relationships with skepticism. Tristan finally admits that he needs help. Mama Rose and Isaac try to get family secrets out of Modise, and Mogorosi conspires to get the will read.

135.title: Episode #1.135
135.plot: Mama Rose and Mogorosi try to wrest the upper hand. Tiro grows increasingly frustrated with an employee's absence and he is forced to turn to a rival for help . Lelo finds herself torn between her old and new life when she spends more time with Zoe.

136.title: Episode #1.136
136.plot: Itumeleng is outraged when he learns what is in Rratladi's will. Modise continues to distance himself from Mama Rose. Jack sets out to prove to a potential employer that he wasn't involved in the recent poaching. Lelo starts to feel outshone by Zoe and does something out of character to get attention.

137.title: Episode #1.137
137.plot: Itumeleng kicks Norman and Mogorosi out of his office and as a result, creates an unlikely alliance. Isaac confronts Itumeleng about a personal issue while Diksie returns to Dinaledi. Karel asks Tiro for a favor and Jason shares good news with Zoe.

138.title: Episode #1.138
138.plot: Mama Rose continues to struggle to keep the lid on her secret, as she and Itumeleng bump heads. Jack gets a new lease on life while Isaac wrestles with his role in the Tladi fold. Lelo is out done once again by Zoe. Ashwin and a colleague form an unlikely bond. Modise feels the need to keep his eye on his brother more than ever.

139.title: Episode #1.139
139.plot: Mama Rose and Modise are suspicious of Itumeleng's sudden desire to embrace Isaac as part of the family. Mama Rose walks straight into Itumeleng's trap. Jack's dogged attempts to find the pot poacher pay off. Lelo and Zoe's competitiveness reaches new heights. Marang's daughter arrives for the December holidays.

140.title: Episode #1.140
140.plot: Isaac struggles to come to terms with the truth about his father, and decides to leave - but not before revealing his mother's secret to all at Dinaledi. Lelo steals Zoe's thunder, and this time Zoe won't stand for it. Tiro gives an old colleague a temporary job which boosts his morale, but infuriates a close friend.

141.title: Episode #1.141
141.plot: The lodge staff gossip about Mama Rose's secret. Modise and Marang blame Itumeleng for a friend's trauma. Jason is only interested in Zoe for one thing, and it's not her creative vision. Zintle and Marang struggle to find common ground. To everyone's surprise, Sarah van Reenen returns and opens up some old wounds.

142.title: Episode #1.142
142.plot: Isaac is in hiding when Modise and Itumeleng find out that he wants to sell his inheritance. Sarah provokes a relative to live up to his new lofty ideals - but in order to do this, the relative must return to Dinaledi. Jason announces that he has secured the final funding for Zoe's project, and continues to nurture his friendship with Tiro, despite tension between their fiancées.

143.title: Episode #1.143
143.plot: Modise and Itumeleng are on the lookout for Isaac to confront him about his inheritance. Jason turns Zoe into a jealous wreck after flirting with a visitor. The visitor starts rubbing people the wrong way. Sarah encourages a family member to go after the Conservation Assistant job.

144.title: Episode #1.144
144.plot: Isaac's paternity continues to complicate his relationship with the Tladi's. Isaac is forced to damp down his anger, and consider reconciliation with his mother and his brothers. Tiro has asks Jack to propose rangers to assist Tristan - but the ranger that he puts forward will antagonize them. Marang's daughter Zintle sets her sights on a lodge employee - and pursues a romantic encounter, despite her mother's objections.

145.title: Episode #1.145
145.plot: Mogorosi attacks an old rival in a bid to hold onto power, but the three Tladi brothers go on the offensive to stop him. A van Reenen family member starts his job as conservation assistant, much to Kate's annoyance, while Sarah suspects that something happened at the van Reenen household during her absence. Zintle continues to snub her mother, but has a lot of affection for a lodge employee.

146.title: Episode #1.146
146.plot: Under pressure from Itumeleng, an elder announces the date for the confirmation of the new chief, but he continues to sow seeds of doubt about who the new chief will be. Jack stands up to Tristan and an old employer. Diksie finds the culprit who broke into the chalet.

147.title: Episode #1.147
147.plot: Zintle's sexuality causes conflict at the lodge. The Tladi community prepares to mark the end of their mourning period for RraTladi, with a traditional ceremony. Itumeleng allows an elder to remain in place as regent, while making it clear that the reins of power now belong to him. Jack's rapport with the Dinaledi rangers pays off and Jason sets a chain of events in motion which could devastate the Lebone family.

148.title: Episode #1.148
148.plot: Sarah's suspicions that Kate and Jack had an affair are confirmed. Kate fears that Sarah is going to tell her Tristan everything. Itumeleng continues to use the elder as his political puppet. Jason asks Tiro to lend him a huge amount of Mondayey for Zoe's project.

149.title: Episode #1.149
149.plot: Zoe tells Tiro and Lelo that a close friend has made a run for it. Isaac feels pressure concerning the inheritance that RraTladi left for him, and what he should do with it. Karel finds out that Kate has admitted to Sarah about her affair, is she going to tell Tristan the truth?

150.title: Episode #1.150
150.plot: Jason and Tiro try to convince Lelo and Zoe to work together. Itumeleng seeks to win the hearts and minds of the community with Mama Rose's help. Ashwin teases Zintle and aggravates Jason. A desperate Kate drops a bombshell on Jack.

151.title: Episode #1.151
151.plot: Kate tries to dissuade Sarah from revealing her affair with Jack, but Sarah remains unmoved. Finally, as the pressure intensifies, Kate takes matters into her own hands. Just when Jason thinks he's on the roll, a lodge employee makes a surprising demand. With the help of Mama Rose, the Tladi men plan a Christmas party for the community.

152.title: Episode #1.152
152.plot: The Van Reenens family is plunged into crises that can destroy them. The heat is turned up on Jason. Itumeleng proves that he has a heart at the community Christmas party.

153.title: Episode #1.153
153.plot: Jack flees for his life while the Van Reenen family teeters on the brink of destruction. Marang's Christmas party is nearly derailed when old family resentments come to the fore. Is Jason's master-plan going to work?.

154.title: Episode #1.154
154.plot: The hunter becomes the hunted. Zoe's world shatters when she finds out the truth. Marang and Zintle continue to pit themselves against each other in the age old mother-daughter battle.

155.title: Episode #1.155
155.plot: Mama Rose goes on a mission to find Isaac a wife. Ashwin and Zintle continue their flirtatious dance, and things get even more heated. Tiro and Lelo go head to head with their failing Magadi negotiations. Kate tries to save what's left of her relationship.

156.title: Episode #1.156
156.plot: Tiro tries to get back in Lelo's good books when he attempts to solve their Magadi issues. Zintle continues to throw her weight around the lodge by offending Mama Rose while seducing and upsetting a ranger.

157.title: Episode #1.157
157.plot: Jack tells Karel to let go of the past but can Tristan ever forgive Jack? Tristan wants to protect Amber but Sarah won't allow anymore lies. Has Sarah pushed her family too far? Mogorosi successfully negotiates Lelo's magadi but alienates Uncle Whatnot. Mama Rose discovers the price of the magadi and tells Lindsay. Zintle demands payment from Isaac for her damaged top.

158.title: Episode #1.158
158.plot: Tiro and Lelo's magadi arrangements become gossip for the community. Marang and Zintle continue to drift apart. A humiliated and wounded Tristan finds new hope with the help of his family and sparks fly between Isaac and Zintle.

159.title: Episode #1.159
159.plot: Tiro tries to do damage control Lelo and Uncle Whatnot. There is a new poaching threat. Kate returns to find out new information about her bridge accident. Marang tries to piece together her failing relationship with Zintle before she goes back home. Itumeleng tries to uncover whether there is something between Isaac and Zintle.

160.title: Episode #1.160
160.plot: Preparations for the Lebone wedding are disrupted by Uncle Whatnot's continued refusal to attend the nuptials. Marang discovers that Zintle has been keeping a disappointing secret. The Van Reenen's continue to disintegrate with the return of Kate - until Tristan finally puts his foot down and demands his family reveal everything that they've been hiding.

161.title: Episode #1.161
161.plot: The Van Reneen clan begins their campaign against the rhino poachers and leaves Kate out of the loop. Tiro meets Lelo's family for the first time and things get off to a rocky start. Marang decides to discipline Zintle and Isaac is given an unwanted task by Itumeleng.

162.title: Episode #1.162
162.plot: Tristan's frustration with the anti-poaching operation causes him to make a grave mistake. Lelo's parents and Whatnot clash over the wedding plans. Lelo's father, Khotso still prefers Modise as a potential son-in-law and Zintle is put to work at Dinaledi.

163.title: Episode #1.163
163.plot: Jack turns up the heat on Itumeleng. Itumeleng finds a nasty surprise waiting for him at the Van Reenen farm. Zintle starts to see Isaac in a different light. Lelo's wedding preparations cause further tension between her and her mother and Zintle makes alterations to her boring uniform.

164.title: Episode #1.164
164.plot: Itumeleng stares death in the face when a dangerous visitor arrives to talk business. Isaac and Zintle are becoming more and more attracted to each other. Lelo and Ousie Gladys continue to butt heads over the looming wedding. Uncle Whatnot makes a show of goodwill at Tiro's expense.

165.title: Episode #1.165
165.plot: Vladimir has Itumeleng's back against the wall. Tiro tries to convince a reluctant Tristan to be his best man. Zintle and Isaac attempt to curb their feelings for each other and Uncle Whatnot bulldozes his way into an important part of the wedding plans.

166.title: Episode #1.166
166.plot: It's the day before the wedding and everything seems to be on track - until Tiro admits he can't find a new MC and Ousie Gladys starts dispensing unwanted advice. Jack tells Karel that they have to join forces with Itumeleng in order to save the reserve.

167.title: Episode #1.167
167.plot: Tiro and Lelo's big day has finally arrived, and Dinaledi is abuzz with preparations for the wedding of the year. As Tiro and Lelo prepare for their nuptials, Zintle finds herself falling into a romance of her own. Despite the happy occasion, all is not well at Dinaledi. Itumeleng finds himself with an unwanted date for the wedding, as Vladimir uncovers Itumeleng's dealings with the Van Reenen's and assigns Itumeleng a burly watcher.

168.title: Episode #1.168
168.plot: The wedding reception kicks off and Vladimir continues to turn up the heat on Itumeleng. Tristan discovers that Karel, Jack and Itumeleng were telling the truth about Vladimir. Zintle is swept up by the romance of the wedding and Uncle Whatnot's love of whiskey has disastrous results. Bernie wages war on Thandi.

169.title: Episode #1.169
169.plot: Itumeleng is not the biggest enemy and Kate feels betrayed by her family. Lelo is determined to be a proper bride, but realizes she is not ready for children. Itumeleng takes matters into his own hands and confronts Vladimir.

170.title: Episode #1.170
170.plot: Itumeleng asserts himself with Vladimir, but ends up biting off more than he can chew. Isaac reveals his true feelings and Diksie has trouble dealing with Lelo's happiness. Kate tries to win back Karel's affection.

171.title: Episode #1.171
171.plot: Itumeleng, the van Reenen's, Tiro and Rossouw find themselves racing into danger as players double-cross one another in a doomed poaching sting. Zintle struggles with personal issues and the Lebones find themselves with a new house-mate after Ousie Gladys meddles in their lives.

172.title: Episode #1.172
172.plot: Vladimir discovers a shocking secret. A confrontation between Itumeleng and Vladimir has fatal consequences. Zintle asks for Bernie's help regarding a life-changing situation and her world falls apart when her worst fears are confirmed.

173.title: Episode #1.173
173.plot: Lelo face the biggest challenge of her life. Tristan blames himself for the shocking events that took place and Marang struggles to keep the Lebone's together. Isaac and Zintle fight while Kate makes a bold decision regarding her future in the Van Reneen household.

174.title: Episode #1.174
174.plot: Tension in the Lebone house escalates when Lelo decides to put her foot down. Bernie lets slip that Zintle has confided in her and Isaac is determined to find out what's going on. Modise is suspicious about Itumeleng's complicity and Rossouw reveals that Itumeleng might struggle to prove his innocence.

175.title: Episode #1.175
175.plot: Marang continues to run Lebone family affairs with an iron fist, and clash with Lelo. Isaac demands answers and Khumo returns home to make an enemy out of Itumeleng. Tristan struggles with his guilt while Lindsay sees Kate's departure as an opportunity.

176.title: Episode #1.176
176.plot: Khumo steps up and takes charge of the Lebone household while his hatred of Itumeleng grows. Isaac and Zintle declare their love for each other - moments before Mama Rose makes a damaging accusation.

177.title: Episode #1.177
177.plot: Dinaledi rangers scramble to impress the new ranger while worrying about the future of the concession and therefore their jobs. Marang and Khumo struggle for control of the family, while Lelo attempts to find her purpose in life.

178.title: Episode #1.178
178.plot: Khumo challenges Marang's authority as head of the Lebone household, but the conflict proves to be too much for him. Zintle ignores Bernie's advice. Newcomer Angie shows Isaac that she's as competent behind the wheel of a 4x4 as she is dealing with unwanted male attention.

179.title: Episode #1.179
179.plot: Bernie turns to Itumeleng for help and reveals Isaac and Zintle's relationship to him. Isaac makes a shocking discovery and Ousie Gladys asks Fana to become her spy in the Lebone house. Ashwin tries to charm Angie.

180.title: Episode #1.180
180.plot: The Lebone House comes undone as Marang clashes with Lelo and Zintle. Jack meets Angie and becomes smitten. Isaac breaks up with Zintle over her lies.

181.title: Episode #1.181
181.plot: Lelo and Marang reach some common ground. Zweli tries to use Zintle's situation as a way for him and Marang to get back together. Jack continues to try his luck with Angie while Diksie chooses sides between Lelo and Marang.

182.title: Episode #1.182
182.plot: It's Valentine's Day at Dinaledi, and emotions are running high. Jack is increasingly drawn to Angie, but she's oblivious to his charms. Blessing returns to the farm but his request to Tristan that he be given more responsibility falls on deaf ears. Zintle struggles with her increasing disillusionment with her father, while relying on Marang more. Tensions between Marang and Lelo come to a head when Lelo pursues a business interest.

183.title: Episode #1.183
183.plot: A war of wills rages between Lelo and Marang.Lelo is torn between pursuing her own dream and staying to fulfill Tiro's dreams. Zweli comes up with a drastic idea for Zintle. Jack angles to get Blessing on his side by claiming that Tristan's letting things slide on the reserve.

184.title: Episode #1.184
184.plot: Zweli and Marang propose raising Zintle's baby as their own while Amber returns to the Van Reenen house for the weekend. Itumeleng solidifies his alliance with Marang and Isaac has mixed feelings about Zintle.

185.title: Episode #1.185
185.plot: Lelo gives Marang control of the land and makes a decision about her future, but it's easier said than done. Jack reminds Isaac that he can never trust Itumeleng. Marang will support Zintle, whatever decision she makes. Zweli does not approve of the decision and decides to leave. The Van Reenen's receive an unexpected guest.

186.title: Episode #1.186
186.plot: Lelo comes to realize how little the Dinaledi community values her. Lelo's revelation about who will be running the reserve shifts the power dynamic between Tristan and Jack. Isaac cases an explosive confrontation between Itumeleng and Modise. Zintle goes on the most difficult journey of her life.

187.title: Episode #1.187
187.plot: Isaac decides to cut ties with his brothers. Zintle and Marang take a major step in their relationship. Jack and Lelo form an alliance while Angie sees another side of Jack.

188.title: Episode #1.188
188.plot: Dinaledi is thrown into chaos when Jack puts his and Lelo's plan into action and Isaac gains the upper hand. Isaac and Mama Rose say their painful goodbyes. Zintle is starting to have doubts about her plan.

189.title: Episode #1.189
189.plot: Zintle and Marang go to the clinic. Itumeleng tries to do some damage control and comes head to head with Lelo. Modise has a visitor from his past who spurs up old feelings. Lelo finds that she might have bitten off more than she can chew - will Jack stay in her corner?

190.title: Episode #1.190
190.plot: Zintle makes a drastic decision about her pregnancy. Karel hatches a plot against Itumeleng. Mama Rose meddles with Modise's love life and he's worried about not having one. What is Itumeleng's plan with Lelo?

191.title: Episode #1.191
191.plot: Marang probes Zintle for information about the baby's father. Zintle's situation forces Diksie to confront some hard truths about her relationship with Khumo. Modise grapples with his approach to life and Lelo finds herself under attack from all sides. Karel proposes a surprising strategy.

192.title: Episode #1.192
192.plot: Itumeleng underestimates Lelo, and is outraged by the outcome of a royal council meeting. Zweli joins Marang and Zintle at the clinic. Modise finally digs in his heels and stands up to his business partner.

193.title: Episode #1.193
193.plot: Itumeleng is given his marching orders. Zintle and Marang try to deal with difficult news. Tristan and Jack tease a sensitive Karel about his river walk, while Sarah feels left out.

194.title: Episode #1.194
194.plot: Sarah and Karel investigate the river as the water levels continue to rise. Itumeleng has his first day at Tribal Council as the future chief. Lelo discovers that Modise is in trouble and tries to help.

195.title: Episode #1.195
195.plot: Itumeleng continues to flex his powers as the young chief. Karel and Sarah bond in the bush and have to deal with a crisis on the river. Mama Rose is shaken by the 'new' Modise, and Zintle begins to understand Lelo's bold decisions.

196.title: Episode #1.196
196.plot: Itumeleng approaches Marang to take a different position at Dinaledi. Itumeleng graciously agrees to help Mogorosi with a community matter. Karel finds himself in a dire situation after accepting a lift with the wrong person.

197.title: Episode #1.197
197.plot: Karel comes face-to-face with a dangerous situation. Sarah is deeply shaken by her father's ordeal and Marang accepts a new position at Dinaledi Lodge. Tristan and Jack's power play continues.

198.title: Episode #1.198
198.plot: The party lifestyle catches up with Modise and he signs an important document. Sarah and Tristan can't locate their dad and Sarah goes to look for him. Jack tries to get into Lelo's good books - this infuriates Tristan, who doesn't believe Lelo can run the reserve. Itumeleng and Modise rush to the hospital after an accident.

199.title: Episode #1.199
199.plot: Itumeleng confronts Lebata about being responsible for the accident. His anger gets the better of him and he humiliates himself in front of Marang. Karel has someone's life in his hands. Angie's confidence is short-lived and she lashes out at Jack.

200.title: Episode #1.200
200.plot: Rossouw hounds Karel for the truth. Jack pursues Angie like a smitten puppy dog. After being upstaged by local politician Lebata, Itumeleng and Modise take on the royal council with full force. Sarah tries to come to terms with her father's ordeal.

201.title: Episode #1.201
201.plot: Itumeleng reveals his vision for the future. Lelo wants to play a more active role in the running of the reserve and Marang discovers that an unlikely candidate would make the perfect PA. Angie and Jack negotiate the "terms and conditions" of their situation.

202.title: Episode #1.202
202.plot: Jack's left in an awkward place with Angie when he spends the day with Lelo on the reserve - and this also irritates Tristan. After a disastrous driving lesson, March 2012 Ang gets Blessing to teach Zintle to drive. Will he succeed? Itumeleng and Modise formulate a plan against Lebata, thanks to Marang.

203.title: Episode #1.203
203.plot: Itumeleng needs a date for the auction and Marang hopes that she'll be it. Tristan fumes when Lelo demands answers about the running of the reserve - to make matters worse, Karel and Sarah stand up for her. Angie makes her intentions clear regarding Jack.

204.title: Episode #1.204
204.plot: The Parlotones performs at the Jacaranda Anti-Poaching Auction and Itumeleng goes up against Lebata as they bid on a painting. Marang discovers where she stands with Itumeleng. Angie is introduced to the Van Reenens and Tristan wants Lelo to prove that she is serious about becoming more involved in the Lebone Reserve.

205.title: Episode #1.205
205.plot: Rossouw receives an unwelcome visitor. Angie and Jack are reminded how dangerous it is being a ranger. Marang learns she has become rusty at reading a man's signals, and wishes she had not allowed herself to hope. Tristan and Lelo find some common ground - but then he delivers bad news.

206.title: Episode #1.206
206.plot: A dark threat shows up on Inspector Rossouw's doorstep making huge demands. Lelo is determined to see her husband's murderer caught. After a dangerous encounter, Angie and Jack's relationship grows. Zintle surprises Blessing while Marang struggles with her feelings for Itumeleng.

207.title: Episode #1.207
207.plot: While Angie receives a welcomed visit from the Van Reenens, she is also surprised by an unwanted one from the past. Marang is jealous of Itumeleng's love life. Mama Rose and Mogorosi hijack Itumeleng's inauguration plans while Captain Rossouw struggles to conceal and get rid of a looming threat.

208.title: Episode #1.208
208.plot: Rossouw puts his plan of action into motion. Marang makes a decision about her and Itumeleng's future. A smitten Jack lies to Angie when she asks him an important question. Rossouw wants to mend fences with an estranged person from his past.

imdb.title: The Wild
synopsis: The main backdrop to The Wild is a stretch of land that is home to a five-star game lodge, presenting the opportunity to make the best of the breathtaking beauty of the African wild.The story revolves around three families the Lebones, the van Reenens and the Tladis. Because of past conflicts, they struggle to negotiate a cohesive future, but the families are bound together because of their relationship to a special piece of land. This is also where you will find an exclusive lodge renowned for its fine dining under head chef Bernie Cupido (Faye Peters), expensive champagne, pampering sessions, game drives at sunset and private chalets. It attracts staff and guests who are up to all kinds of shenanigans.
